Brazilian Soccer Player

Brazilian Soccer Player can only be created by building the Brazilian Football Pitch. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Brazilian Soccer Player can enter other nations' territory without an Open Border Agreement to generate one-time [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism boost like Great Musicians. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]All other nations will also receive the same amount of [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism boost generated by the Brazilian Soccer Player.

Association Football is the most popular sport in Brazil. The Brazilian national football team has won the FIFA World Cup tournament a record five times, in 1958, 1962, 1970, 1994 and 2002, and is the only team to succeed in qualifying for every World Cup competition ever held. It is among the favorites to win the trophy every time the competition is scheduled. After Brazil won its 3rd World Cup in 1970, they were awarded the Jules Rimet Trophy permanently. But 365 days before World Cup 2014 began, Brazil's rank dropped to 22nd, an all-time-low position.
Islamic Prophet
Islamic Prophet

Islamic Prophet is the unique prophet unit for Arabia. He can found or enhance a religion, construct the special Holy Site improvement and spread religion one more time than the normal prophet unit (5 times in total). He can also write Quran to generate one-time amount of [ICON_CULTURE] Culture like Great Writers, and even stronger(This ability would be available even if he has only 1 time to spread the religion).

Prophets in Islam include "messengers", bringers of a divine revelation via an angel; and "prophets", lawbringers that Muslims believe were sent by God to every people, bringing God's message in a language they can understand. Belief in Islamic prophets is one of the six articles of the Islamic faith, and specifically mentioned in the Quran.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Tower [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Defense
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Fixed Unit, can NOT move. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]After finishing building a Citadel Improvement, a Citadel Unit is created on that tile Citadel. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If you order your worker to change the Citadel Improvement into other kinds of Improvements, its Citadel Unit will be also removed. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the city where the Citadel is captured by the enemy, the Citadel Unit suffers -50 HP per turn and -50% [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Strength due to lack of supply, so it will be destroyed in two turns if you don't retake that city. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Citadel units are structures indeed so they can NOT earn Promotions. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Land-based Aircrafts are allowed to deployed on the Citadel tile with a Firebase or Military Airbase.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Defensive Structure [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]No [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower cost
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Expensive Maintenance Cost [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Don't think you can be free from invasion only by building servel Citadels. They cannot move so the enemy can easily take a detour.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Use its sight and firepower to keep an eye on your territory while your troops are on the frontline, especially for areas with important resources or choke points in case of possible enemy harassment. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]It is a relatively cheap way to deploy Land-based Aircrafts outside your cities. Build them on safe areas to allow your aircrafts to extend their flight range.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Like other strategy games, Siege Units have great combat bonus against Citadel Units. One Siege Units can destroy a firebase easily from a long distance. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]It is a waste of time to mess with an enemy's Citadel Unit not in your way. You could simply bypass it and take the enemy's city directly.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Garrison [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Guerrilla [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Medic [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannon Fodder
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can fortify by clicking the "Fortify" button or pressing "F". It will +50% [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Strength when defending at the begining of the next turn. When it moves, it will lose its fortification.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Workers can transfer to Militia anytime [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cheap training cost and maintenance [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive Comabt Bonus inside Friendly Territory [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cause less casualties if destroyed [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can heal other units
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Poorly trained, too weak to fight in the frontline against enemy regular army [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Poor motility [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Penalty outside Friendly Territory
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Transfer your first Warrior to a Worker, if there are available resources nearby, to speed up the development of your first city. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If you are embroiled in an unexpected war, or attacked by barbarians, but you have no or few military units. Transfer your Workers to Militia Units to buy you some time. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Bring some Militia Units with "Military Reserve" promotion to frontline during an invasion to serve as medical troops. What's more, they are competent cannon fodder to waste enemy's firepower.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]They cannot defeat your professional army in a fair fight. If outnumbered, call artillery or air-ground support like in the real life. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Use Special Forces or Hit-and-run units to deal with them by their great combat bonus or mobility.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Special Mission [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ganker [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Emergency Assistance
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Special Forces Unit have many special abilities. Click the certain buttons on the "unit commands" panel to perform them. Be aware that some actions will consume all its[ICON_MOVES] MPs in this turn.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can perform special missions that regular army can't [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Effective against enemy's guerrilla warfare [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Good mobility
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Hard to train (Can only be trained in cities with Military Academy and cannot be purchased) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can be easily outnumbered if fighting against enemy regular army
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Use its "Riot Control" ability to speed up the submission of newly conquered cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Use its "Emergency Heal" ability to save your high value units in danger. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Use its "Shock and Awe" ability to capture enemy unique elite units or experimental units you have missed before. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Sneak into enemy's territory to sabotage cities, high value units, bridges, strategic resources. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]One experienced Special Forces Unit (with "Blitz" and "Sabotage Cities" Promotion) can capture a small city in the same turn after paradropping. If carefully planned, you can completely destory a nation in one turn.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]They cannot defeat your professional army in a fair fight and you won't be outnumbered. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Use Citadels or Hit-and-run units for overwatch. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Always keep your vital cities garrisoned in a modern war.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Core [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Multipurpose [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Durable
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can fortify by clicking the "Fortify" button or pressing "F". It will +50% [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Strength whe ndefending at the begining of the next turn. When it moves, it will lose its fortification.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Strong combat strength [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Excellent price to performance [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Versatile [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Durable and heals quiclky
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Limited mobility [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]No escaping abilities
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If you are building up an army, but don't know which unit you should choose, train an infantry unit. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Infantry Units are competent for both aggressive and defensive missions. In rough terrains, they can even outrun Heavy Mounted Units or Tanks. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Always stay in groups for flanking bonus. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Heavy Mounted Units or Tanks can destroy them easily under most circumstances. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Use Siege Units to bombard enemy fortified Infantry Units.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Counter [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannon Fodder [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Escort
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can fortify by clicking the "Fortify" button or pressing "F". It will +50% [ICON_STRENGTH]Combat Strength whe ndefending at the begining of the next turn. When it moves, it will lose its fortification.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Very cheap compared with their countering units [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Excellent price to performance [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cause less casualties if destroyed
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Poor mobility
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]They can defend your position from ferocious enemy's charging with Heavy Mounted Units or Tanks. it is worthwhile to sacrifice one cheap Counter Unit in exchange of damaging or destroying several enemy's Heavy Mounted Units or Tanks. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]They are competent cannon fodder to waste enemy's firepower. If necessary, order one Counter Unit to capture the city which will certainly be recaptured in the next turn to reduce your loss. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ranged Units can destroy them easily under most circumstances. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Use Siege Units to bombard enemy fortified Counter Units. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Their mobility is limited, just simply take a detour.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Recon [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Support
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Caravels and Explorers are able to enter other nations' territory even without an Open Border Agreement. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Caravel can "disembark" to transfer into an Explorer if next to a land plot. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]It moves stealthily but it still can be seen if get next to an enemy unit.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Stealth and Anti-stealth [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Excellent mobility [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Excellent sight
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Very Weak [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannot pillage
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]They can help you to explore the map to offer inportant intels. Do not forget to train them in early-game. In most cases, the whole map should be fully dsicoved before you entering the modern era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Use Explorer's "Sell Exotic Goods" ability to earn some fast cash inside other civilizations' or city-states' territories. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If you have available Caravels and Explorers, send them into your furtue enemy's territory to gather intels for your planned invasion. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]They are not aggressive units and cannot pillage. Do not worry about them.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Core [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Pusher [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Eiminator
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When it inflicts more damage to the enemy than it receives, forces the enemy unit to withdraw. (If the enemy unit can't withdraw, it will receive additional damage.)
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Best explosiveness [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Easy to use, easy to kill [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Good mobility [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can easily break through enemy's line
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Weak vs Counter Units which are much cheaper [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Lose its mobility when attacking cities [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Weak in defending and can be easily outnumbered
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Use them to crush enemy's line. They are unstoppable against almost any other units except Counter Units. Even enemy's unit cannot be killed in one hit, it can also "push" the enemy unit away to break the line or reveal other units under its protection. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the enemy's front-line is guarded with Counter Units, try to flank them. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Pick your target wisely for efficiency. Do not waste their firepower on low value targets like militias. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Do not run too far, save some MPs to back to safe areas after attacking. They are vulnerable while defending. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Protect your experienced Heavy Mounted Units or Tanks. They are high value units and can fight much more efficiently than rookies. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Put some Counter Units on your flanks and gurad your high value units. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]"Every man is his own worst enemy", your Heavy Mounted Units or Tanks can easily catch up and eliminate enemy's Heavy Mounted Units or Tanks. It is less efficient than using Counter Units, however Counter Units can always be shaken off due to their limited mobilities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Under the worst case, use cannon fodder untis to waste enemy's charge to save your high value units.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Initiator [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ganker [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Escape [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Support
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The default "Right Click" will order the unit to perform a ranged attack. If you want it to perform a melee attack, click the "Attack" button on the left or press "A" key and click on the enemy unit. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If it successfully put the debuff an enemy unit or your unit gets a debuff by the enemy's attack. You will hear a special sound effect and get a notice on the right side of the screen.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can make strong enemy units much more vulnerable [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Excellent mobility [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Good survivability [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Versatile
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Jack of all trades [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Expensive [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Low price to performance [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Steep learning curve
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Hit-and-run Units are not so "easy to use" for new players. Careful plan and mirco control are required to make full use of these units. You have four different ways to bring them into play. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1. Scouting: Before attacking enemy's units, send Hit-and-run Units with "Scouting" promotions to move next to the target. This will reduce the target's defense as well as providing flank bonus to make your attack more efficient. In most cases, the first Hit-and-run Units you trained should choose this promotion. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2. Adding Debuff: If you face strong enemy units, like advanced units, elite units and experimental units, use Hit-and-run Units with "Sunder" promotions to attack them to reduce thier combat strength in defence. The "sunder" effect can be multiplied to -50% combat strength, so you can kill enemy's units even two eras ahead of yours. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]3. Hunt Down: Hit-and-run Units with "Hunt Down" promotions have significant combat bonus against wounded units (even a unit with 99 HP is also considered "wounded"). As a result, they are very powerful to finish up enemy's debuffed or escaping units, especailly those on the other side of a river. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]4. Gank: Besides working as a support unit. A group of 3-5 Hit-and-run Units is able to work alone as a tactical team with high mobility. One unit with "Scouting" promotions provides reconnaissance, while 1-2 unit(s) with"Sunder" promotions softening the enemy and 1-3 unit(s) with "Hunt Down" promotions to finish the enemy up. Such a tactical team can defeat almost all kinds of combination of enemy units in all terrains, without any loss. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Hit-and-run Units cannot function as your main force due to its low combat strength and high training cost. Make sure they are back to safe areas by the end of your turn. They are vulnerable while defending. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Protect your experienced Hit-and-run Units. They are high value units and can fight much more efficiently than rookies. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Remember Hit-and-run Units can perform both melee attacks and ranged attacks. Use melee attacks against enemy's Ranged Units while use ranged attacks for enemy melee units to minimize your casualties. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]They are weak while defending and can be easily defeated by your main force units. Beaware that enemy's units with "Hunt Down" promotions also have combat bonus while defending. You should use unit of full HP to attack them. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]With an advantage of shooting range and great combat bonus, Archery Units can easily kill enemy's mounted archers while Anti-air Units can quickly bring down enemy's helicopters. Stack Archery Units or Anti-air Units with Infantry Units or Counter Units to defend your flanks. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Always keep a neat formation to leave no gaps for enemy's Hit-and-run Units to slip in.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Initiator [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Disabler [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Support
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If gained "Fire Support" promotions and stacked with an Infantry Unit, an Counter Unit, a Citadel Unit or a Militia Unit, this unit will automatically launch a Counter-attack at the enemy unit attacking at this plot. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If it successfully put the debuff an enemy unit or your unit gets a debuff by the enemy's attack. You will hear a special sound effect and get a notice on the right side of the screen.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can disable enemy units and create chaos [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Good price to performance [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Versatile
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Low Combat Strength [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Very weak in defending itself [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must work with escort units
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Archery Units and Anti-air Units are very different from their counterparts in BNW. They are no longer main force units as they shoudl be. They are support units and must work with other units for a better output. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Units with "Barrage" Promotions can paralyze any enemy's units. Use it to disable strong enemies which cannot be killed in the current turn. This is very helpful if you are outnumbered. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The perfect defensive formation: stack an Infantry Unit, an Counter Unit, a Citadel Unit or a Militia Unit with a Ranged Unit which has "Fire Support" promotions together during defensive turns. The enemy's Infantry Units, Hit-and-run Units will suffer huge casualties if they dare to attack your position. However, it is useless against Siege Units' bombardment. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Always work with Hit-and-run Units with "Scouting" promotions to have the best effect. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Special Forces Units can offer "Target Guide" for this unit to boost its damage. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Comparing with the Siege Units, Archery Units and Anti-air Units are more fit with defensive missions. However they can still be very useful to eliminate enemy's Counter Units to open a way for your Heavy Mounted Units and Tanks. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]They are very weak in melee combat, which means any melee units in the same era can easily kill them in one hit. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Siege Units have longer shooting ranges and combat bonus against them. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Anti-air Units have limited firepower against Fighters or Carrier-based Aircrafts. Use "Air Sweep" ability to damage or destroy them to clear a path for your air strike if your land units cannot reach them. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Although they cannot capture your city, your citizens in the city will be killed by their ranged attacks once the city HP is 0. So get rid of them ASAP!

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Initiator [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Disabler [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Pusher [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]City Attacker
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]As long as other friendly units can see the target and it is within the attacking range, it is attackable. Even this unit cannot see the target. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If it successfully put the debuff an enemy unit or your unit gets a debuff by the enemy's attack. You will hear a special sound effect and get a notice on the right side of the screen.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Long firing range [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Strong attacking Cities, Citadel Units, Archery Units and Anti-air Units [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can break a deadlock in a battle [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can weaken enemy units
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Expensive [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Poor mobility [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Very weak in defending itself [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must work with escort units
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]In SuperPower Mod, cities have less initial HPs but their HPs regain faster. Cities with a larger population size will have much more HPs. As a result, Siege Unit is vital for attacking a big city. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Siege Units have great combat bonus attacking enemy fortified units, Archery Units and Anti-air Units, which makes it capable of destroying enemy's defensive formations to break the deadlock. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Siege Units with "Collateral Damage" promotions can also be used to "suppress" the enemy by to weaken their attacks in the next turn. This is very helpful if you are outnumbered. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Always work with Hit-and-run Units with "Scouting" promotions to have the best effect. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Special Forces Units can offer "Target Guide" for this unit to boost its damage. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Experienced Siege Unit are high value units and should never go out alone. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]They are very weak in melee combat, which means any melee units in the same era can easily kill them in one hit. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cancel the fortification of your Infantry Units or Counter Units by moving them back and forth, also separate stacked units, if enemy's Siege Units' bombardment is unavoidable. Fortified units and stacked units will suffer much more damage during Siege Units' bombardment and may be killed in one hit. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Although they cannot capture your city, your citizens in the city will be killed by their ranged attacks once the city HP is 0. So get rid of them ASAP!

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Initiator [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Nuker
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]As long as other friendly units can see the target and it is within the attacking range, it is attackable. Even this unit cannot see the target.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Longest firing range [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Weapon of mass destruction [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can break a deadlock in a battle [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Effective vs enemy naval units for its range and AOE effects [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If you have enough of them, you can achieve similar effects as using nuclear weapons but much more environment-friendly
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Very Expensive [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Worst mobility [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Very weak in defending itself [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must work with escort units [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]No bonus attacking cities
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]These weapons with AoE Effect can damage multiple enemy's units in one shot. So open fire at crowds! [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Their long firing range can be used agaisnt naval ships near the coast, which is the only way that land force can have the change to deal with the naval force in a fair fight. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Pick your target wisely for efficiency. Do not waste their firepower on low value targets like militias. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Always work with Hit-and-run Units with "Scouting" promotions to have the best effect. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Special Forces Units can offer "Target Guide" for this unit to boost its damage. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Without doubt, they are high value units and should never go out alone. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]They are very weak in melee combat, which means any melee units in the same era can easily kill them in one hit. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]They are very slow, so you have plenty of time for counter attack. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Separate your groups of units to minimize the loss, if enemy's AoE bombardment is unavoidable. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Although they cannot capture your city, your citizens in the city will be killed by their ranged attacks once the city HP is 0. So get rid of them ASAP!

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Core [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Multipurpose [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Durable
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When it inflicts more damage to the enemy than it receives, forces the enemy unit to withdraw. (If the enemy unit can't withdraw, it will receive additional damage.)
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Strong Combat Strength [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Versatile [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Durable and heals quiclky
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannot attack units on land [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]No escaping abilities
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If you are building up an navy, but don't know which unit you should choose, build a Naval Melee Unit. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Naval Melee Units are competent for both aggressive and defensive missions, which makes them the main force (but not the flagships) of your navy. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Always stay in groups for flanking bonus. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]They can move after attacking and very useful for capturing enemy's coastal cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Early Naval Melee Units are very powerful for a rush strategy since ealy cities are quite vulnerable. Two Trireme can take down an enemy's coastal Capital in two turns in Ancient Era. However, the cost of a Trireme almsot equals an ancient World Wonder. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Naval Ranged Units and Cruisers have great combat bonus against them. In most cases, them can be destroyed in one or two hit by melee attacks. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Although Naval Hit-and-run units are weak against them, but you can use wolfpack strategy to paralyze them by "Barrage" effects. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Destroyers have limited firepower against Fighters and Carrier-based Aircrafts. Use "Air Sweep" ability to damage or destroy them to clear a path for your air strike if your land units cannot reach them.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ganker [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Recon [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Disabler [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Counter
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The default "Right Click" will order the unit to perform a ranged attack. If you want it to perform a melee attack, click the "Attack" button on the left or press "A" key and click on the enemy unit. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If it successfully put the debuff an enemy unit or your unit gets a debuff by the enemy's attack. You will hear a special sound effect and get a notice on the right side of the screen.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Excellent mobility [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Good price to performance [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Good at wolfpack
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Weak in defending itself [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]No escaping abilities
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]They are the cheapest regular Naval Units. So build more for reconnaissance and wolfpack strategy. Also don't be afraid of losing one of them. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]They are support units so they cannot serve as the main force. However they can still work in group as a tactical team away of your navy like Land Hit-and-run units. Use them to ambush enemy's flagships or pillage enemy's cargo ships. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Early Naval Hit-and-run Units can use their ranged attack agaisnt enemy's units in coastal areas or harass enemy coastal cities. While Submarines have longer initial shooting range but lose the ability to attack land units or cities. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Escort your larger navy ships with enough Naval Melee Units. Naval Melee Units can destroy those small vessels in all cases with one hit. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Always keep a neat formation to leave no gaps for enemy's Naval Hit-and-run Units to slip in. It is very troublesome to have your flagships ambushed during expedition. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Although Naval Hit-and-run Units cannot capture your cities, they can cause catastrophic result by pillaging all your improvements on water plots and block your coastal cities. Place some naval militia units to guard your coastline.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Support [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Initiator [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Disabler [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Pusher
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The default "Right Click" will order the unit to perform a ranged attack. If you want it to perform a melee attack, click the "Attack" button on the left or press "A" key and click on the enemy unit. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If it successfully put the debuff an enemy unit or your unit gets a debuff by the enemy's attack. You will hear a special sound effect and get a notice on the right side of the screen. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Missile Cruisers will automatically resupply its guided missiles.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Strong Combat Strength [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Long firing range [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can add debuffs to the enemy's units
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Expensive [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]No escaping abilities [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Weak vs Counter Units which are much cheaper
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If owned both "Barrage" and Collateral Damage" promotions, Naval Ranged Ships can weaken enemy's both defending and attacking combat strength to quickly disable its combat effectiveness. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]With decisive high melee combat strength, Naval Ranged Ships can efficiently destroy an enemy's Naval Melee Unit with minimum loss. Remember to use its melee attack ablity. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Naval Ranged Ships can also capture coastal cities by using melee attacks, but it cannot move after capturing the city. So make sure the captured city is secure in the next turn. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Heavy Cruisers and Missile Cruisers can provide capable anti-air support. Missile Cruisers can even intercept guided missiles. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Always work with Naval Hit-and-run Units with "Scouting" promotions to have the best effect. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Admirals can offer "Target Guide" for this unit to boost its damage. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]They are support units, so always escort them with Naval Melee Units. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Missile Cruisers have unlimited supplies of guided missiles. You may use them for a saturation attack. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Naval Hit-and-run Units have great combat bonus to quickly paralyze or destroy them. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Use the longer shooting range advantage of Battleships or Aircraft Carriers to attack them from a safe distance.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Nuker [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Durable [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Deterrence [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Flagship
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]As long as other friendly units can see the target and it is within the attacking range, it is attackable. Even this unit cannot see the target.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Strongest Combat Strength in its era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Weapon of mass destruction [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can break a deadlock in a battle [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Longest firing range [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Deterrence
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Very expensive [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Poor mobility [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]No escaping abilities [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Weak vs Counter Units which are much cheaper
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Boasting the Strongest Combat Strength in its era, Battleships can take out most of enemy's units of the same era in one shot if accompanied with enough buffs and debuffs to the target. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Always work with Naval Hit-and-run Units with "Scouting" promotions to have the best effect. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Admirals can offer "Target Guide" for this unit to boost its damage. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]These weapons with AoE Effect can damage multiple enemy's units in one shot. So open fire at crowds! [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Their long firing range can be used to offer fire support for inland forces. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Pick your target wisely for efficiency. Do not waste their firepower on low value targets like militias. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Even after the rise of naval aviation, Battleships are still useful to break the deadlock whiel the enemy have strong anti-air powers. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Battleships are high value units but not dependent on experience. Even rookie Battleship units can cause massive damage to the enemy, which means you don't need to care about your experienced battleships too much. It is worthwhile to sacrifice your battleship to save an experienced Aircraft Carrier if necessary. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Naval Hit-and-run Units have great combat bonus to quickly paralyze them. Battleships are very tough. You may need 5-7 Naval Hit-and-run Units of its same era to destroy a Battleship in one turn. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Use the attacking range advantage of Aircraft Carriers to attack them from a safe distance. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Separate your groups of units to minimize the loss, if enemy's AoE bombardment is unavoidable.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Strategic Weapon [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Deterrence [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Medic [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Flagship
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Automatically resupply its Carrier-based Aircrafts (One Aircraft Unit per turn) when it is inside Friendly Territory. After gained "Carrier Supply III" promotion, it can resupply its Carrier-based Aircrafts even outside Friendly Territory. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]EXP earned by its Carrier-based Aircrafts will transfer to the Aircraft Carrier. So the Aircraft Carrier will earn the promotions. Even the Carrier-based Aircrafts are all shot down, those promotions will not lose. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]New Carrier-based Aircrafts added to the Aircraft Carrier CANNOT move until NEXT turn and it will automatically inherit all available promotions in the NEXT turn. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]if the Aircraft Carrier is destroyed, it will lose all of its Carrier-based Aircrafts on board. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Carrier-based Aircrafts is allowed to rebase to other Aircraft Carriers but the promotions will NOT be transferred with the aircraft. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]For the Game balance other than the reality, Carrier-based Aircrafts is not allowed to rebase to cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When clicking "Order ALL UNITS" button on the left, all Aircraft Carriers will instantly switch to "intercept" mode. However if its HP is lower than 30, it will sleep and heal till its HP is full.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A floating weapons platform [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Highly Versatile [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can heal other units [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Deterrence
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Extremely expensive [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Combat preparations takes a long time [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Poor mobility [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If running out of its Carrier-based Aircrafts, it is totally useless
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Aircraft Carriers are the symbol of a modern navy. It is a strategic weapon. In the late game, one Super-Carrier is enough to defeat a small nation without enough anti-air forces. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Newly built Aircraft Carriers are empty. You have to wait for a few turns for its Carrier-based Aircrafts fully loaded. So build them ahead of time! [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Aircraft Carriers must be accompanied by a full carrier battle group to make full use of its power. One single Aircraft Carrier is easy to be outnumbered and destroyed. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]One carrier battle group able for continental warfare can includes 2-4 Aircraft Carriers, 1-3 Battleship(s), 2-5 Cruisers, 8-12 Destroyers, 6-9 Submarines. 1-2 Great Admirals(s). [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Since every Carrier-based Aircraft's attack will transfer its EXP to its carier, Aircraft Carrier will earn new promotions rapidly if engaged in a full fight. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Needless to say, Aircraft Carriers are the most valued units. Protect your experienced Aircraft Carriers at all cost if you want to win the war. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Submarines have great combat bonus to quickly paralyze them. Aircraft Carriers are not so tough as you may expect. They can be destroyed by 3-4 Submarines in one turn. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If you have enough anti-air powers, enemy's Aircraft Carriers cannot cause too much damage. Land-based Fighters have higher combat strength, thus they can easily defeat Carrier-based Aircrafts during a dogfight. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Aircraft Carriers in deep ocean can be nuked without teh fear of nuclear winter.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Initiator [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Support [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Air Supremacy Control
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]It is a Land-based Aircraft so it cannot land on [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Aircraft Carriers[ENDCOLOR]. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]For the Game balance other than the reality, it can NOT attack land or naval units. However you can still use the "Airstrike" button on the left to show its intercepting range. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When clicking "Order ALL UNITS" button on the left, all fighter units will instantly switch to "intercept" mode. However if its HP is lower than 30, it will sleep and heal till its HP is full. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]While performing "Air Sweep" it can damage or even destroy enemy intercepting aircrafts, land and sea AA units.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can shoot down anything of the same era in the sky [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Long intercepting range
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Expensive [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only engage in air combat
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]You must have enough Fighters to control the sky if you want to win a modern war. However do not build excessively since it can not do substantial damage to your enemy. Otherwise you may not have enough manpower to build attack aircrafts. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Rember to perform an "Air Sweep" everytime before launching an air strike. The intercepting range of Fighters is very long. You will never know how many enemy's Fighters hiding in the fog of war. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]It is always wise to promote your Fighters with "Dogfight" promotion first, since the Fighters' top priority is air supremacy controling. This will also help them to survive from dogfights to have more time for further promotions. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Always keep your Fighters upgraded to the most advanced models. Dated Fighters will suffer a crushing defeat fighting against advanced Fighters due to the huge gap of their combat strength and flight range. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Protect your experienced Fighters. An ACE pilot can comfortably shoot down three rookies from the sky in one turn. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The most effective method against enemy's Fighters is to build more Fighters or build advanced Fighters to overwhelm the enemy. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]AA units are not so effective against enemy's Fighters, however they can buy you some time. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Military Airbase (Citadel Unit) can be attacked by enemy's Fighter's air sweep. But it won't cause damage.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Assassin [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Pusher
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]It is a Land-based Aircraft so it cannot land on [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Aircraft Carriers[ENDCOLOR].
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the attack is successful, it can destroy any land or naval units of its era in one shot [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive little damage when attacking units [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can easily take out enemy garrisoned units or aircrafts in the city
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Weak when intercepted [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Relatively short flight range
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Since its attacks ignore all terrain or any defensive bonus, it is extremely efficient to take down enemy's units hiding in rough terrains like deep forest or jungles. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Attack Aircrafts also have a deadly effect attacking enemy's naval ships. With enough Attack Aircrafts accompanied by Fighters, you are able to take out the enemy's fleet while your main naval force is out. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]With "Surgical Strike" promotions, Attack Aircrafts can even damage or destroy enemy's units in the city. Be aware they can damage or destroy enemy's aircrafts stationed in the target city as well. Use Fighters to clear a path and your Attack Aircrafts can wipe out enemy's air force on their runways in one turn. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Rember to perform an "Air Sweep" everytime before launching an air strike. The intercepting range of Fighters is very long. You will never know how many enemy's Fighters hiding in the fog of war. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Move up your Attack Aircrafts while pushing further, since they have a relatively shorter flight range. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Attack Aircrafts don't have any anti-air weapons. As a result, they are bobbing target for Fighters. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A land Anti-air Unit or Military Airbase (Citadel Unit) may not be able to shoot down an Attack Aircraft during interception. But it will cause severe damage to the Attack Aircraft and protect your unit under its attack. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Heavy Cruiser or a Missile Cruiser is able to shoot down an Attack Aircraft during interception if it has "Flak Cannon I" promotion.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Strategic Weapon [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Deterrence
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]It is a Land-based Aircraft so it cannot land on [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Aircraft Carriers[ENDCOLOR].
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the attack is successful, It can quickly put a nation back to the Stone Age [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Global strikes capable [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannot be stopped by the enemy land or naval anti-air units [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Deterrence
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Extremely expensive [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]After a few bombardments, it can offer you a useless captured city
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]This is a strategic weapon, which will destory your enemy's war capability instead of killing units. it is not designed to win a battle but to win a war. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Strategic Bombers' "Napalm Bomb" Promotions can cause catastrophic civilian casualties to enemy's cities, which will prove to be a great impact to your opponent's economy. What's more, it can reduce the resistance tiem of your newly captured city, in an inhumane way. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Use its "Air Siege I" promotion to destroy enemy's military production to paralyze the war capability. What's more, the target city will be more vulnerable after its military buildings destroyed. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If you want to bring further impact to your enemy's economy, use Strategic Bombers with "Air Siege II" and "Air Siege III" promotions to bomb enemy's main cities to destroy its production buildings adn power plants. This is especially effective if you want to stop your opponent from launching spaceship. However, if you want to capture and make use of the target city, do not do so. Otherwise you will destroy your own buildings. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Strategic Bombers can also be used for tactical bombing by gaining "Supply Line Bombardment" which can cause chaos to enemy's invading units, especially for enemy's naval units.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Land and sea AA units are not abel to stop the Strategic Bombers. Only Fighters of the same era can intercept and shoot down these huge aircrafts. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]You can build Bomb Shelters in you main cities to minize the citizen casualty, but it cannot prevent building loss. Unfortunately Bomb Shelters will consume additional electricity and expensive maintenance cost. This is another way how Strategic Bombers impact the opponent's economy as strategic weapons.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Role:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Nuker [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Strategic Weapon [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Game Ender [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Deterrence
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Operation[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]It works the same way as an land-based aircraft and can be based in a player-owned city or loaded on a SSBN. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All strategic nuclear weapons have the same blast radius of 2 hexes.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pros:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Deterrence [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannot be Intercepted [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Global strikes capable
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cons:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Very expensive [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Create Fallout [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May cause [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Nuclear Winter[ENDCOLOR] which will make the planet uninhabitable
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_CYAN]Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Atomic Bomb is the first strategic nuclear weapon but it is less effective and cannot destroy cities,it can be upgraded to the nuclear missile in the information era, which has much longer attacking range, and it is more powerful to destroy cities with with a population less than 6. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The ultimate weapon in SuperPower Mod is ICBM. It can wipe out any non-capital cities or reduce the population of capital city to 1. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If there are too many nuclear explosions in the planet (the number of plots covered with fallout reaches 1% of the whole map, including the water plots). The nuclear winter will fall, which cause all tiles with Food Output larger than 3 will reduce by 1 until it reaches 3. If more nuclear explosions occur, the nuclear winter will deteriorate. If the the number of plots covered with fallout reaches 10% of the map, all tiles' Food and Production output will reduce to 0 and the planet will be uninhabitable. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Once the nuclear winter is triggered, it cannot be stopped. But if no more nuclear explosions occur, [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Nuclear explosions in water areas will not create fallout, thus it won't speed up the nuclear winter, it won't deteriorate. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_MAGENTA]Counter Tactics:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]There is no way to intercept a strategic nuclear weapon. You must destroy them before launching. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The resolution of Nuclear Non-Proliferation can be unlocked eariler (Available once any nation discovers NUclear Fusion) which means you can stop the global nuclear war before everyone has the ability. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]You can build Bomb Shelters in you main cities to minize the citizen casualty, but it cannot prevent building loss. Unfortunately Bomb Shelters will consume additional electricity and expensive maintenance cost. This is another way how it impact the opponent's economy as strategic weapons.
Citadel
[COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Stronghold[ENDCOLOR]
A stronghold or fortification is a military construction or building designed for defense.
[COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Firebase[ENDCOLOR]
A Firebase is a modern military construction or building designed for defense.
[COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Military Airbase[ENDCOLOR]

An military airbase (sometimes referred to as a military airfield, military airport, air force station, air force base or short airbase) is an aerodrome used by a military force for the operation of military aircraft.

Row.Text: Intercontinental Ballistic Missile (ICBM)

[ICON_BULLET]The most powerful nuclear weapon in the game. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]One single ICBM can utterly destroy a non-Capital city and everything within the range of 2 tiles.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Consumes 3 Air Unit Capacity in a city.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can be loaded on [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]SSBNs[ENDCOLOR].
Intercontinental Ballistic Missile (ICBM)

An intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) is a ballistic missile with a minimum range of more than 5,500 kilometres (3,400 mi)[1] primarily designed for nuclear weapons delivery (delivering one or more nuclear warheads). Similarly conventional, chemical and biological weapons can also be delivered with varying effectiveness. Most modern designs support multiple independently targetable reentry vehicles (MIRVs), allowing a single missile to carry several warheads, each of which can strike a different target.
[COLOR_MAGENTA]Militia[ENDCOLOR]
Militia

A militia generally is an army or other fighting unit that is composed of non-professional fighters, citizens of a nation or subjects of a state or government who can be called upon to enter a combat situation, as opposed to a professional force of regular, full-time military personnel, or historically, members of the warrior nobility class.
[COLOR_MAGENTA]Conscript[ENDCOLOR]
Conscript

Conscription, or drafting, is the compulsory enlistment of people in a national service, most often a military service. Conscription dates back to antiquity and continues in some countries to the present day under various names.
[COLOR_MAGENTA]Modern Militia[ENDCOLOR]
Modern Militia services as the modern national defense force.
Doppelsoldner
WIP
Zweihänder
Cause 100% splash damage to the enemy unit on the same tile when attacking.
Landsknechts
Can earn [ICON_GOLD] gold for each enemy killed (50% of its [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength).
Chasqui
Chasqui

The Chasquis (also Chaskis) were agile and highly trained and physically fit messengers that were in charge of carrying the quipus, messages and gifts throughout the Inca empire. A message could travel up to 240 km per day through the chasquis relay system.
[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]The Imperial Guards[ENDCOLOR]
The Imperial Guards

The Imperial Guards of the Tang Dynasty, also known as the Forbidden Troops (traditional chinese: 禁軍, simplified Chinese: 禁军, pinyin: jìn jūn), evolved initially from honour bodyguards of the emperor and garrison of the Imperial capitals during its formation in early 7th century, into the only military force that remained under the control of the central authorities after the An Shi Rebellion which lasted from AD 755 to 763.
Mohawk Warrior
Mohawk Warrior

The Iroquoian soldiers were one of the most powerful and influential Indian nations. If their desperate efforts failed, they would all die -- either by musket and tomahawk in the burning villages, or by barbarous torture after capture.
Black Watch
Black Watch
The Black Watch, 3rd Battalion, Royal Regiment of Scotland (3 SCOTS) is an infantry battalion of the Royal Regiment of Scotland.
Polynesian Cargoship
Polynesian Cargoship
The first sailing canoes emerged in ancient Polynesia over 1,000 years ago.The canoes were built from island materials such as plaited leaf sails, island woods, organic webbing.
Cruiser Tank
Cruiser Tank

The cruiser tank (also called cavalry tank or fast tank) was a British tank concept of the inter-war period. Dissatisfaction with experimental medium tank designs of the mid-1930s, led to the development of specialised fast, lightly-armoured cruiser tanks and slow, heavily-armoured Infantry tanks.
Cromwell Tank
Cromwell Tank

The Cromwell tank was one of the most successful of the series of cruiser tanks fielded by Britain in the Second World War. Named after the English Civil War leader Oliver Cromwell, the Cromwell was the first tank put into service by the British to combine a dual-purpose gun, high speed from the powerful and reliable Meteor engine, and reasonable armour, in a balanced package.
Mamluk

Mamluk is the Egyptian unique unit, replacing the Knight. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Prohibits Other Religions Spread to the City Garrisoned. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain the Faith [ICON_PEACE] as the amount of damage dealt when attacking enemies.
WIP
Sultan's Blade
Gain the Faith [ICON_PEACE] as the amount of damage dealt when attacking enemy troops.
Mobile AA
Mobile AA
Anti-aircraft warfare or counter-air defence is defined by NATO as "all measures designed to nullify or reduce the effectiveness of hostile air action.
Main Battle Tank
Main Battle Tank (MBT)

A main battle tank (MBT), also known as a battle tank or universal tank, is a tank that fills the armor-protected direct fire and maneuver role of many modern armies. They were originally conceived to replace the light, medium, heavy and super-heavy tanks. Development was spurred in the Cold War with the development of lightweight composite armour. They are still supplemented in some armies with light tanks. Not all armored, tracked military vehicles are tanks and are designed for other battlefield roles.
WIP

The T-34 was a Soviet medium tank that had a profound and lasting effect on the field of tank design. Although its armour and armament were surpassed later in the war, it has often been credited as the most effective, efficient and influential tank design of the Second World War. At its introduction, the T-34 possessed an unprecedented combination of firepower, mobility, protection and ruggedness. Its 76.2 mm (3 in) high-velocity tank gun provided a substantial increase in firepower over any of its contemporaries; its heavy sloped armour was difficult to penetrate by most contemporary anti-tank weapons. When first encountered in 1941, the German tank general von Kleist called it "the finest tank in the world" and Heinz Guderian confirmed the T-34's "vast superiority" over existing German armour of the period.
Type 052 Destroyer
Type 052 Destroyer
WIP

The Type 052 Luhu-class is one of the first modern multi-role guided missile destroyers built by China. There are currently two units in active service with the People's Liberation Army Navy Surface Force. There are serial types of the class successor: 052B, 052C, 052D.
Huihui Pao
Huihui Pao

Counterweight trebuchets do not appear with certainty in Chinese historical records until about 1268, when the Mongols laid siege to Fancheng and Xiangyang. At the Siege of Fancheng and Xiangyang, the Mongol army, unable to capture the cities despite besieging the Song defenders for years, brought in two Persian engineers who built hinged counterweight trebuchets. These engines were called by the Chinese historians the Huihui Pao (回回砲)("huihui" means Muslim) or Xiangyang Pao (襄陽砲), because they were first encountered in that battle.

He has "Target Guide" ability: spending all his [ICON_MOVES] to provide +33% [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] Ranged Combat Strength for the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ranged Unit[ENDCOLOR] in the Same Tile of this unit for this turn.
