Row.Text: Olifant Mk1B
Olifant Mk1B
WIP

The Olifant mk1B main battle tank was developed and produced by the Olifant Manufacturing Company, OMC Engineering pty Ltd, based in South Africa. Development of the Olifant started in 1976 and first entered service with the South African Armoured Corps in the late 1970s. OMC Engineering later became Reumech OMC, then Vickers OMC and, in September 2002 was renamed Alvis OMC, following the acquisition of Vickers Defence by Alvis plc. In September 2004, Alvis OMC became part of BAE Systems Land Systems.
Boer Commando
Boer Commando
WIP
The Boer commando was the basic unit of organisation of the militia of the Boer people of South Africa. The term came into English usage during the Second Boer War.
Amphibious IFV
Amphibious IFV
WIP
The BMP-1 is a Soviet amphibious tracked infantry fighting vehicle, which is widely equipped by The Iraqi Republican Guard.
Canarias-class Cruiser
Canarias-class Cruiser
WIP

The Canarias class was a class of heavy cruiser of the Spanish Navy. Two ships of the class were completed in the 1930s. They were built in Spain by the Vickers-Armstrongs subsidiary Sociedad Española de Construcción Naval upon a British design, and were a modified version of the Royal Navy′s County class. The two ships completed, Canarias and Baleares, both saw service during the Spanish Civil War, the latter being sunk.
Royal Canadian Air Force
Royal Canadian Air Force
WIP

The Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) (French: Aviation royale canadienne, ARC) is the air force of Canada. Its role is to "provide the Canadian Forces with relevant, responsive and effective airpower". The RCAF is one of three environmental commands within the unified Canadian Armed Forces. As of 2013, operating 258 manned aircraft and 9 unmanned aerial vehicles, the Royal Canadian Air Force consists of 14,500 Regular Force and 2,600 Primary Reserve personnel, supported by 2,500 civilians. Lieutenant-General Michael J. Hood, CMM CD, is the current Commander of the Royal Canadian Air Force and Chief of the Air Force Staff.
Skoda Howitzer
Skoda Howitzer

The Skoda 75 mm Model 1939 (75 mm M.39) was a mountain gun manufactured in by Skoda Works and exported in small numbers to Romania and Iran. The design was related to the Bofors L/22 sold to Switzerland. For transport, the gun could be broken into eight sections and carried by mule.
Mobile Artillery
Mobile Artillery

Self-propelled artillery (also called mobile artillery or locomotive artillery) is artillery equipped with its own propulsion system to move towards its target. Within the term are covered self-propelled guns (or howitzers) and rocket artillery. They are high mobility vehicles, usually based on caterpillar track carrying either a large howitzer or other field gun or alternatively a mortar or some form of rocket or missile launcher. They are usually used for long-range indirect bombardment support on the battlefield.
Rocket Artillery
A devastating long-range attack unit which can attack with Area of Effects damage.
Rocket Artillery

A multiple rocket launcher (MRL) is a type of unguided rocket artillery system. Like other rocket artillery, multiple rocket launchers are less accurate and have a much lower (sustained) rate of fire than batteries of traditional artillery guns. However, they have the capability of simultaneously dropping many hundreds of kilograms of explosive, with devastating effect..
Tank Destroyer
A fast anti-tank vehicle can move after attacking, excellent at destroying enemy tanks. Can perform one-hex ranged attack.
Tank Destroyer

A tank destroyer is a type of armored fighting vehicle armed with a gun or missile launcher, and is designed specifically to engage enemy armored vehicles. Tanks are generally armoured fighting vehicles designed for front-line combat which combines operational mobility and tactical offensive and defensive capabilities and perform all primary tasks of the armoured troops on the battlefield.
Howitzer
Howitzer

A howitzer is a type of artillery piece characterized by a relatively short barrel and the use of comparatively small propellant charges to propel projectiles at relatively high trajectories, with a steep angle of descent. Until fairly recently, about the end of the Second World War, such weapons were characterized by a barrel length 15 to 25 times the caliber of the gun.
Volley Gun
Volley Gun

A volley gun is a gun with several barrels for firing a number of shots, either simultaneously or in sequence. They differ from modern machine guns in that they lack automatic loading and automatic fire and are limited by the number of barrels bundled together.
Motorised Infantry
Motorised Infantry

Motorising infantry is the first stage towards the mechanisation of an army. Civilian trucks are readily adaptable to military uses of transporting soldiers, towing guns, and carrying equipment and supplies. This greatly increases the strategic mobility of infantry units, which would otherwise rely on marches or railroads. In practice, armies have found it advantageous to develop trucks to military specifications, such as all-wheel drive, in order to have vehicles that function reliably in extremes of weather and terrain.
Culverin
Culverin

A culverin was a relatively simple ancestor of the musket, and later a medieval cannon, adapted for use by the French in the 15th century, and later adapted for naval use by the English in the late 16th century.
Grand Battery
Fast and Powerful Sige Unit. Only the France may build it. It has indirect fire and doesn't need to set up before attacking. It has the promotion of Sunder I-II
Grand Battery

Grand Battery (Grande Batterie, meaning big or great battery) was a French artillery tactic of the Napoleonic wars. It involved massing all available batteries into a single large, temporary one, and concentrating the firepower of their guns at a single point in the enemy's lines.
Land Support Vehicle
General Dynamics Land Systems
A combat vehicle, also known as a ground combat vehicle, is a self-propelled, weaponized military vehicle used for combat operations. Combat vehicles can be wheeled or tracked.
Anti-tank Missile
Anti-tank Missile

An anti-tank missile (ATM), anti-tank guided missile (ATGM), anti-tank guided weapon (ATGW) or anti-armor guided weapon, is a guided missile primarily designed to hit and destroy heavily armored military vehicles.
Railroad Gun
Railroad Gun

A railway gun, also called a railroad gun, is a large artillery piece, often surplus naval ordnance, mounted on, transported by, and fired from a specially designed railway wagon. Many countries have built railway guns, but the best known are the large Krupp-built pieces used by Germany in World War I and World War II. Smaller guns were often part of an armoured train.
Brazilian Labor
Brazilian Labor
Brazilian Labor is unique civilian unit of Nrazil, replacing the Worker. It can move ignore terrain cost and build improvements 25% faster than ordinary Workers.
Brazil has the world's seventh largest economy by nominal GDP, and the seventh largest by purchasing power parity.
Monk
Monk
Monk is the unique religious unit of Siam, replacing the Missionary. It has better mobility and religious strength. It can Spreads religion to other cities three times.

A monk (from Greek: μοναχός, monachos, "single, solitary" and Latin monachus[1]) is a person who practices religious asceticism, living either alone or with any number of other monks. A monk may be a person who decided to dedicate his life to serving all other living beings, or to be an ascetic who voluntarily chooses to leave mainstream society and live his life in prayer and contemplation. The concept is ancient and can be seen in many religions and in philosophy.
Shaman
Shaman

Shaman is the unique unit of Hun, replacing the Inquisitor. It can betrained or be purchased with faith in cities. However it is not a religious unit and cannot remove other religions from cities. It can use mysterious sorcery to remove any debuffs of your units and make units around it healing +30HP per turn.

The word "shaman" probably originates from the Tungusic Evenki language of North Asia. According to ethnolinguist Juha Janhunen, "the word is attested in all of the Tungusic idioms" such as Negidal, Lamut, Udehe/Orochi, Nanai, Ilcha, Orok, Manchu and Ulcha, and "nothing seems to contradict the assumption that the meaning 'shaman' also derives from Proto-Tungusic" and may have roots that extend back in time at least two millennia.
[COLOR_MAGENTA]Galley[ENDCOLOR]
Galley
A galley is a type of ship that is propelled mainly by rowing. The galley is characterized by its long, slender hull, shallow draft and low clearance between sea and railing.
[COLOR_MAGENTA]Monitor[ENDCOLOR]
Monitor
A monitor was the class of relatively small warship which was neither fast nor strongly armoured but carried disproportionately large guns.
[COLOR_MAGENTA]Corvette[ENDCOLOR]
Corvette

A corvette is a small warship. It is traditionally the smallest class of vessel considered to be a proper (or "rated") warship. The warship class above the corvette is that of the frigate, while the class below was historically that of the sloop-of-war. The modern types of ship below a corvette are coastal patrol craft and fast attack craft.
[COLOR_MAGENTA]Littoral Combat Ship[ENDCOLOR]
Littoral Combat Ship

The littoral combat ship (LCS) is a class of relatively small surface vessels intended for operations in the littoral zone (close to shore) by the United States Navy. It was "envisioned to be a networked, agile, stealthy surface combatant capable of defeating anti-access and asymmetric threats in the littorals."
Littorio-class Battleship
Littorio-class Battleship
WIP

The Littorio class, also known as the Vittorio Veneto class, was a class of battleship of the Regia Marina, the Italian navy. The class was composed of four ships—Littorio, Vittorio Veneto, Roma, and Impero—but only the first three ships of the class were completed. Built between 1934 and 1942, they were the most modern battleships used by Italy during World War II. They were developed in response to the French Dunkerque-class battleships, and were armed with 381-millimeter (15.0 in) guns and had a top speed of 30 knots (56 km/h; 35 mph). The class' design was considered by the Spanish Navy, but the outbreak of World War II interrupted construction plans.
Turkish Privateer
Turkish Privateer

A privateer (sometimes called corsair or buccaneer) was a private person or ship authorized by a government by letters of marque to attack foreign vessels during wartime, and take them as prizes. Captured ships were subject to condemnation and sale under prize law, with the proceeds divided between the privateer shipowners and crew. Privateering was a way of mobilizing armed ships and sailors as naval auxiliaries.
Protected Cruiser
Protected Cruiser
WIP

The protected cruiser is a type of naval cruiser of the late 19th century, so known because its armoured deck offered protection for vital machine spaces from fragments caused by exploding shells above. Protected cruisers were an alternative to the armoured cruisers, which also had a belt of armour along the sides.
1st Class Destroyer
1st Class Destroyers
WIP

The Imperial Japanese Navy (IJN; Kyūjitai: 大日本帝國海軍 Shinjitai: 大日本帝国海軍 About this sound Dai-Nippon Teikoku Kaigun or 日本海軍 Nippon Kaigun, literally "Navy of the Greater Japanese Empire") was the navy of the Empire of Japan from 1868 until 1945, when it was dissolved following Japan's defeat and surrender in World War II.
Dreadnought Battleship
Dreadnought Battleship

With their victory in the Russo-Japanese War of 1904–05, the Japanese became concerned about the potential for conflict with the US. The theorist Satō Tetsutarō developed the doctrine that Japan should have a battlefleet at least 70% the size of that of the US. This would enable the Japanese navy to win two decisive battles, the first early in a war against the US Pacific Fleet, and the second against the US Atlantic Fleet which would inevitably be dispatched as reinforcements.
Light Ironclad
Light Ironclad
An ironclad is a steam-propelled warship protected by iron or steel armor plates used in the early part of the second half of the 19th century.
Heavy Cruiser
Heavy Cruiser

The heavy cruiser was a type of cruiser, a naval warship designed for long range and high speed, armed generally with naval guns of roughly 203mm calibre (8 inches in caliber) and displacing approximately 10,000 tons. While the general mission of the heavy cruiser to act as a fast scout for a battle fleet and protect and hunt down commerce was largely unchanged from the days of sail, its design parameters were dictated by the Washington Naval Treaty of 1922 and the London Naval Treaty of 1930.
Cruiser Georgios Averof
Cruiser Georgios Averof

Georgios Averof (Greek: Θ/Κ Γεώργιος Αβέρωφ) is a modified Pisa-class armored cruiser built in Italy for the Royal Hellenic Navy in the first decade of the 20th century. The ship served as the Greek flagship during most of the first half of the century. Although popularly known as a battleship (θωρηκτό) in Greek, she is in fact an armored cruiser (θωρακισμένο καταδρομικό), the only ship of this type still in existence.
U-boat
U-boat
WIP

U-boat is the anglicised version of the German word U-Boot [ˈuːboːt] ( listen), a shortening of Unterseeboot, literally "undersea boat". While the German term refers to any submarine, the English one (in common with several other languages) refers specifically to military submarines operated by Germany, particularly in the First and Second World Wars. Although at times they were efficient fleet weapons against enemy naval warships, they were most effectively used in an economic warfare role (commerce raiding), enforcing a naval blockade against enemy shipping.
Ship of the Line
Ship of the Line

A ship of the line was a type of naval warship constructed from the 17th through to the mid-19th century to take part in the naval tactic known as the line of battle, in which two columns of opposing warships would manoeuvre to bring the greatest weight of broadside firepower to bear. Since these engagements were almost invariably won by the heaviest ships carrying the most powerful guns, the natural progression was to build sailing vessels that were the largest and most powerful of their time.
Empire Expedition Fleet
Empire Expedition Fleet
The Songhai Empire held a great naval fleet and planned to cross the Atlantic Ocean. Unfortunately they failed to set off before the disintegration of the empire.
Kirov-class Battlecruiser
Kirov-class Battlecruiser
WIP

The Kirov-class battlecruiser is a class of nuclear-powered warship of the Russian Navy, the largest and heaviest surface combatant warships (i.e. not an aircraft carrier or amphibious assault ship) in operation in the world. Among modern warships, they are second in size only to large aircraft carriers, and of similar size to a World War I-era battleship. The official designation of the ship-type is "heavy nuclear-powered guided missile cruiser" (Russian: тяжёлый атомный ракетный крейсер). The ships are often referred to as battlecruisers by western defense commentators due to their size and general appearance.
Mistral-class Amphibious Assault Ship
Mistral-class Amphibious Assault Ship
WIP

The Mistral class is a class of three amphibious assault ships, also known as a helicopter carrier, of the French Navy. Referred to as "projection and command ships" (French: bâtiments de projection et de commandement or BPC), a Mistral-class ship is capable of transporting and deploying 16 NH90 or Tiger helicopters, four landing barges, up to 70 vehicles including 13 AMX Leclerc tanks, or a 40-strong Leclerc tank battalion,[3] and 450 soldiers. The ships are equipped with a 69-bed hospital, and are capable of serving as part of a NATO Response Force, or with United Nations or European Union peace-keeping forces.
Eurocopter EC665 Tigre
Eurocopter EC665 Tigre

Eurocopter EC665 Tigre is a carrier-based attack helicopter. It can be automatically resupplied on a Mistral-class Amphibious Assault Ship. It is more powerful and has a longer flight range than the guided missile. It will transfer EXPs earned in battle and inherit all promotions of its carrier like other carrier-based aircrafts.

The Airbus Helicopters Tiger, formerly known as the Eurocopter Tiger, is a four-bladed, twin-engined attack helicopter which first entered service in 2003. It is manufactured by Eurocopter (now Airbus Helicopters), the successor company to Aérospatiale's and DASA's respective helicopter divisions, which designate it as the EC665. In Germany it is known as the Tiger; in France and Spain it is called the Tigre.
Nuclear-powered Carrier
Nuclear-powered Carrier
Aircraft carriers have evolved from converted cruisers to nuclear-powered warships that carry numerous fighter planes, strike aircraft, helicopters, and other types of aircraft.
Nimitz-class Carrier
Nimitz-class Carrier
WIP

The Nimitz-class supercarriers are a class of ten nuclear-powered aircraft carriers in service with the United States Navy. The lead ship of the class is named for World War II United States Pacific Fleet commander Fleet Admiral Chester W. Nimitz, the U.S. Navy's last fleet admiral. With an overall length of 1,092 ft (333 m) and full-load displacement of over 100,000 long tons, they have been the largest warships built and in service.
Arsenal Ship
Arsenal Ship

An arsenal ship was a concept for a floating missile platform intended to have as many as five hundred vertical launch bays for mid-sized missiles, most likely cruise missiles. In current US naval thinking, such a ship would initially be controlled remotely by an Aegis Cruiser, although plans include control by AWACS aircraft such as the E-2 Hawkeye and E-3 Sentry.
Ballistic Missile Submarine (SSBN)
Can carry up to 9 Nuclear Missiles, ICBM or EMP missile.

The SSBN is the only unit can load and launch Nuclear Missile, ICBM and EMP missiles. One SSBN can destroy the whole civilization! Besides being a stealthy missile carrier, it is also equipped with torpedoes and can fight like a noraml nuclear attack submarine.
Ballistic Missile Submarine

A ballistic missile submarine is a submarine equipped to launch submarine-launched ballistic missiles (SLBMs) with nuclear warheads. In the US Navy they have the designation SSBN and they are nicknamed 'boomers', a common term of art used in everyday briefings and base operations. Virtually all ballistic missile submarines are nuclear powered and are therefore nuclear submarines.
Missile Destroyer
Missile Destroyer

Destroyers (with a DD hull classification symbol) primarily perform anti-submarine warfare duty while guided missile destroyers (DDGs) are multi-mission (anti-submarine, anti-aircraft and anti-surface warfare) surface combatants, with an emphasis on anti-surface warfare.
Sejong the Great-class Destroyer
Sejong the Great-class Destroyer

The Sejong the Great-class destroyers (Sejongdaewang-Ham or Hangul: 세종대왕급 구축함, Hanja: 世宗大王級驅逐艦), also known as KD-III, are guided missile destroyers of the Republic of Korea Navy (ROKN). The second ship was commissioned in August 2010. As of 2010, the ROKN has committed itself to deploy three ships with an option for three more.
Dreadnought
Dreadnought

The dreadnought was the predominant type of battleship in the early 20th century. The first of the kind, the Royal Navy's Dreadnought, made such a strong impression on people's minds when it was launched in 1906 that similar battleships built subsequently were referred to generically as "dreadnoughts", and earlier battleships became known as pre-dreadnoughts.
Minas Geraes
Minas Geraes

The Minas Geraes class, spelled Minas Gerais in some sources, consisted of two battleships built for the Brazilian Navy in the early twentieth century. Named Minas Geraes and São Paulo, the ships were intended to be Brazil's first step towards becoming an international power, and they consequently initiated a South American naval arms race. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Purchase with lower [ICON_GOLD] price and +280 [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points when be built, gains points to open [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age when killing enemy.
La Armada Invincible
La Armada Invincible is a heavy combat vessel that can also be used to gain some gold uppon defeat enermy naval units. Only the Spanish civilization can build it.

The Spanish Armada (Spanish: Grande y Felicísima Armada or Armada Invencible, literally "Great and Most Fortunate Navy" or "Invincible Fleet") was a Spanish fleet of 130 ships that sailed from A Coruña in August 1588 under the command of the Duke of Medina Sidonia with the purpose of escorting an army from Flanders to invade England. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It gains [ICON_GOLD] Gold equals to the [ICON_STRENGTH] Strength of the enemy it destorys.(Not inheritable)

Replace.Text: A fire ship, used in the days of wooden Replaceed or sailing ships, was a ship filled with combustibles, deliberately set on fire and steered (or, where possible, allowed to drift) into an enemy fleet, in order to destroy ships, or to create panic and make the enemy break formation.

Battering Rams are a Hunnic unique unit replacing the Catapult. Use Battering Rams to knock down the defenses of a city. They have the Cover I promotion to keep them safe from ranged units; attack them with melee units to defeat them.

Row.Text: Sloop of War
Cog

A cog (or cog-built vessels) is a type of ship that first appeared in the 10th century, and was widely used from around the 12th century on. Cogs were generally built of oak, which was an abundant timber in the Baltic region of Prussia. This vessel was fitted with a single mast and a square-rigged single sail. These vessels were mostly associated with seagoing trade in medieval Europe, especially the Hanseatic League, particularly in the Baltic Sea region.
Dragonship
WIP
Dragonship

Viking ships were marine vessels of particular designs, used and built by the Vikings during the Viking Age. The boat-types were quite varied, depending on what the ship was intended for, but they were generally characterized as being slender and flexible boats, with symmetrical ends with true keel. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It gains [ICON_GOLD] Gold twice as the [ICON_STRENGTH] Strength of the enemy it destorys.(Not inheritable)

You can only purchase Carrier-Based-Aircrafts on Carriers, the cost is 1/5 of the current buildable Air Superiority Fighter.
Super-Carrier
The Super-Carrier is the nuclear age evolution of the Aircraft Carrier.
Dassault Mirage 2000
Dassault Mirage 2000
WIP

The Dassault Mirage 2000 is a French multirole, single-engine fourth-generation jet fighter manufactured by Dassault Aviation. It was designed in the late 1970s as a lightweight fighter based on the Mirage III for the French Air Force (Armée de l'Air).
PZL.23 Karas
PZL.23 Karas
WIP

The PZL.23 Karaś was a Polish light bomber and reconnaissance aircraft designed in the mid-1930s by PZL in Warsaw. It was the primary Polish reconnaissance bomber in use during the Invasion of Poland.
PZL W3 Sokol
PZL W3 Sokol
WIP
The PZL W-3 Sokół (en: Falcon) is a Polish medium-size, twin-engine, multipurpose helicopter manufactured by PZL-Świdnik (now AgustaWestland Świdnik).
Saab JAS 39 Gripen
Saab JAS 39 Gripen

The Saab JAS 39 Gripen (English: "griffin") is a light single-engine multirole fighter aircraft manufactured by the Swedish aerospace company Saab. It was designed to replace the Saab 35 Draken and 37 Viggen in the Swedish Air Force (Flygvapnet).
Sukhoi Su-27
Sukhoi Su-27
WIP

The Sukhoi Su-27 (Russian: Сухой Су-27) (NATO reporting name: Flanker) is a twin-engine supermaneuverable fighter aircraft designed by Sukhoi. It was intended as a direct competitor for the large United States fourth-generation fighters such as the Grumman F-14 Tomcat and F-15 Eagle, with 3,530-kilometre (1,910 nmi) range, heavy aircraft ordnance, sophisticated avionics and high maneuverability. The Su-27 was designed for air superiority missions, and subsequent variants are able to perform almost all aerial warfare operations. It was designed with the Mikoyan MiG-29 as its complement.
Carrier-based Aircraft (Jet)
Carrier-based Aircraft (Jet)

Carrier-based aircraft, sometimes known as carrier-capable aircraft or carrier-borne aircraft, are naval aircraft designed specifically for operations from aircraft carriers. The term is generally applied only to fixed-wing aircraft, as naval helicopters are able to operate from a wider variety of ships, including helicopter carriers and container ships.
Carrier-based Aircraft (STOVL)
Carrier-based Aircraft ((STOVL)

STOVL takeoffs are accomplished with "ski-jumps", instead of a catapult. STOVL use usually allows aircraft to carry a larger payload as compared to during VTOL use, while avoiding the complexity of a catapult. The best known example is the Hawker Siddeley Harrier Jump Jet,[4] despite being capable of VTOL takeoffs, is usually operated as a STOVL aircraft to increase its fuel and weapons load.
Sea Harrier FRS1
Sea Harrier FRS1
Sea Harrier FA2
Sea Harrier FA2
WIP

The British Aerospace Sea Harrier is a naval short take-off and vertical landing/vertical take-off and landing jet fighter, reconnaissance and attack aircraft; the second member of the Harrier Jump Jet family developed. It first entered service with the Royal Navy in April 1980 as the Sea Harrier FRS1 and became informally known as the "Shar". Unusual in an era in which most naval and land-based air superiority fighters were large and supersonic, the principal role of the subsonic Sea Harrier was to provide air defence of Royal Navy aircraft carriers.
Dive Bomber
Dive Bomber

A dive bomber is a bomber aircraft that dives directly at its targets in order to provide greater accuracy for the bomb it drops. Diving towards the target simplifies the bomb's trajectory, which improves the accuracy of the drop.
Attack Aircraft
Attack Aircraft

An attack aircraft (also called a strike aircraft or attack bomber) is tactical military aircraft that has a primary role of attacking targets on the ground or sea, with greater precision than bombers, and which is prepared to encounter stronger low-level air defenses.
Stealth Attack Aircraft
Stealth Attack Aircraft

Stealth aircraft are designed to avoid detection using a variety of advanced technologies that reduce reflection/emission of radar, infrared, visible light, radio-frequency (RF) spectrum, and audio, collectively known as stealth technology.

Replace.Text: Advanced Strategic Bomber for attacking Cities. Can kill population or destroy buildings in enemy City. This unit consumes 4 Air Unit Capacity in your City and cannot be deployed on Carriers.

Row.Text: Attack Helicopter
Attack Helicopter
An attack helicopter is a military helicopter with the primary role of an attack aircraft, with the capability of engaging targets on the ground, such as enemy infantry and armored vehicles.
AH-64 Apahce
AH-64 Apahce
WIP

AH-64 Apache is a four-blade, twin-engine attack helicopter with a tailwheel-type landing gear arrangement, and a tandem cockpit for a two-man crew. It features a nose-mounted sensor suite for target acquisition and night vision systems. It is armed with a 30 mm (1.18 in) M230 Chain Gun carried between the main landing gear, under the aircraft's forward fuselage. It has four hardpoints mounted on stub-wing pylons, typically carrying a mixture of AGM-114 Hellfire missiles and Hydra 70 rocket pods. The AH-64 has a large amount of systems redundancy to improve combat survivability.
Jet Bomber
Jet Bomber
A strategic bomber is a mid-to-long range heavy bomber aircraft designed to drop large amounts of ordnance onto a distant target for the purposes of debilitating the enemy's capacity to wage war.
EMP Missile
EMP Missile
WIP

EMP Missile is not designed to destroy enemy' units or cities but to disabel them from functioning. It can be used for both tactical and strategic purposes. For tactical attacks, it can disable a large group of enemy army or fleet to buy you some time from being ambushed, or make them vulnerable to your area-of-effect damage. For strategic purposes, it can stop enemy's main cities' production to impact its war capacity and economy. Since it can be intercepted by enemy anti-air units, make sure the sky is clear before launching or strike first at the begining of your invasion. It is a high-tech weapon so it can only affect your enemies' units and cities who already owned the Computer Technology. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It won't cause fallout and cannot be banned by the nuclear non-roliferation resolution.

An electromagnetic pulse (EMP), also sometimes called a transient electromagnetic disturbance, is a short burst of electromagnetic energy. Such a pulse may occur in the form of a radiated electric or magnetic field or conducted electrical current depending on the source, and may be natural or man-made. The damaging effects of high-energy EMP have been used to create EMP weapons. These are typically divided into nuclear and non-nuclear devices. Such weapons, both real and fictional, are gaining awareness from the public by means of popular culture.
Interceptor Aircraft
Interceptor aircraft

An interceptor aircraft, or simply interceptor, is a type of fighter aircraft designed specifically to prevent successful missions by enemy aircraft, particularly bombers and reconnaissance aircraft. There are generally two classes of interceptors, light aircraft built for outright performance, and heavier aircraft designed to fight at night or in heavy weather and operate over longer ranges.
Drone UAV

[ICON_BULLET]Unmanned reconnaissance aircraft. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only be deployed by certain naval units after discovering the Artificial Intelligence Technology. Cannot be built in cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Moves stealthily and can enter other nations' territory even without an Open Border Agreement. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Return to its carrier at the end of the current turn and will be available to deploy again by the next turn.
Drone UAV

An unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV), commonly known as drone, is an aircraft without a human pilot on board. Its flight is controlled either autonomously by computers in the vehicle or under the remote control of a pilot on the ground or in another vehicle.
Explorer

[ICON_BULLET]An upgrade version of Scout. It can enter other nations' territory even without an Open Border Agreement. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The explorer can be both acquired by "disembarking" a Caravel or be trained in cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The explorer can be upgraded to an Archaeologist unit.

Exploration is the act of searching for the purpose of discovery of information or resources. Exploration occurs in all non-sessile animal species, including humans. In human history, its most dramatic rise was during the Age of Discovery when European explorers sailed and charted much of the rest of the world for a variety of reasons. Since then, major explorations after the Age of Discovery have occurred for reasons mostly aimed at information discovery.
Recon Cavalry
Airship
Airship

An airship or dirigible is a type of aerostat or lighter-than-air aircraft that can be steered and propelled through the air using rudders and propellers or other thrust mechanisms. Unlike aircraft that use aerodynamics, such as fixed-wing aircraft and helicopters that produce lift by moving an airfoil through the air, aerostatic aircraft stay aloft by having a large "envelope" filled with a lifting gas that is less dense than the surrounding air.
[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]Paratrooper[ENDCOLOR]

Paratroopers are military parachutists — soldiers, marines, and others trained in parachuting into an operation and usually functioning as part of an airborne force. In World War II, paratroopers most often used parachutes of a round design. These parachutes could be steered to a small degree by pulling on the risers (four straps connecting the paratrooper's harness to the connectors) and suspension lines which attach to the parachute canopy itself.

Replace.Text: The Airborne Forces is an advanced paradroping unit specially developed to breach enemy lines. This specialized infantry acts coupled with transport airplanes which allow them to use a Paradrop maneuver to instantly move up to 20 tiles into enemy territory (he has to start from friendly territory), and then it could even use its remaining moves to take up a suitable attack position. After earning the "Blitz" Promotion, it can attack in the same turn as paradropping.

Row.Text: Mounted Archer
Mounted Archer

A horse archer, horsed archer, or mounted archer is a cavalryman armed with a bow, able to shoot while riding from horseback. Archery has occasionally been used from the backs of other riding animals.
Carabinier
Carabinier

A carabinier (also sometimes spelled carabineer or carbineer) (carabinero in Spanish, carabiniere in Italian) is in principle a soldier armed with a carbine. A carbine is a shorter version of a musket or rifle. The word is derived from the identical French word carabinier.
Eagle Warrior
Eagle Warrior

Eagle warriors or eagle knights (Classical Nahuatl: cuāuhtli [ˈkʷaːwtɬi] (singular) or cuāuhmeh [ˈkʷaːwmeʔ] (plural)) were a special class of infantry soldier in the Aztec army, one of the two leading military orders in Aztec society.

Initially carries 3 Aircraft; capacity may be boosted through promotions.
Advanced naval ranged unit of the Information Era, can be upgraded from Battleships. It can carry 3 Missiles and defend itself against attack from the air. However it is weak against submarines.

One of the first gunpowder units of the game. Only the Americans may build it. Replaces the Musketman. This Unit may move through rough ground as though it were flat, receives a combat bonus when defending.
The most advanced front-line Infantry Unit. Starts with Medic Promotion and can build Fort.
Advanced front-line Infantry Unit, stronger than its previous version and can build Fort. Weak vs Tanks.

Upgraded front-line Infantry Unit, stronger and faster than its previous version. Weak vs Landships and Machine Gun, however, it has the ability to build Fort in the battle field to improve its survivability.
The Machine Gun is a ranged unit which is best against enemy infantry. Use it at the front line for additional firepower.
Gatling guns are part of your front-line troops for excellent fire support, being as useful against melee troops as infantry. However it is still weak when attacked.
Advanced hovering fast-attack unit can cross mountain and water. It can also offer fire support for ground troops.
Helicopter only spend 1 MP in all terrians and can also cross mountain and water. Use its firepower to cover your ground troops. However it is weak when attacked by anti-air units.
Stronger and faster than its previous version, it no longer need to spend extra [ICON_MOVES] MP to set-up before attacking.
Self-propelled Howitzer is an advanced version of Howitzer, which can quickly deploy and fire.

A self-propelled gun (SPG) is a form of self-propelled artillery, and in modern use is usually used to refer to artillery pieces such as howitzers. Self-propelled guns are mounted on a motorized wheeled or tracked chassis. As such the gun can be maneuvered under its own power as opposed to a towed gun that relies upon a vehicle or other means to be moved on the battlefield.
Multiple Launch Rocket System is an updated rocket artillery unit which has better mobility.

Multiple Launch Rocket System has a better mobility than its previous version. This devastating ranged unit has a fire range of 4. Its weapon can deal damage with area of effects (100% damage to the unit on target tile, 50% "splash damage" to adjacent units). However it is less effective bombarding cities.
The Tercio is a special unit mixed with Musketman and Pikeman with a higher [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength than the Musketman, as well as a Bonus vs Mounted promotion.

This Unit is stronger in combat than the Musketman and fights at a higher strength against mounted units.This unit is designed to defend your infantry line from enemy mounted units charging. However, it is still weak when attacked by enemy ranged units.
Advanced Mounted Unit designed to be on the attack and break through enemy battle lines.
Will intercept enemy aircraft which try to bomb nearby Units within 3 tiles. Also can scroll down to shoot enemy land units within 2 tiles. However it is less effective except vs helicopters.
Will intercept enemy aircraft which try to bomb nearby Units within 4 tiles. Its missile can also target enemy land units within 2 tiles. However it is less effective except vs helicopters.

Improves [ICON_FOOD] Food [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and [ICON_GOLD] Gold by constructing Improvements on map tiles outside of Cities, both on land on on water tiles. Special civilian unit for archaeological discoveries. May only be trained or purchased in cities with a University.

The Hatamoto is the Japanese unique unit, replacing the Longswordsman. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Flank Attack bonus +5%, +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement; [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can earn culture [ICON_CULTURE] points for each enemy killed (50% of its [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength). [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can build Dojo in city.
Unique unit of the Japanese civilization. Strong vs Cities and fortified units. Replaces the Longswordsman.

The Zero is the Japanese unique mutil-purpose Attacking Aircraft unit, replacing the Dive Bomber. With its "Anti-Fighter"Promotion, its air-sweep proves to be deadly for enemy intercepting fighters. What's more, with its anti-fighter ability, it can always survive and finish its mission even intercepted. It is always smart for Zeros to attack in groups - and it is very cheap for mass production. Use some Zero to shoot down enemy fighters while others can safely attack land or naval targets.
A mutil-purpose Attacking Aircraft. Only the Japanese may build it. This Unit can not only attack land or naval units but also can perform an air sweep to take down enemy intercepting fighters.

Flank Attack bonus +5%.

Can earn culture [ICON_CULTURE] points for each enemy killed (50% of its [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength), this ability would lose with upgrades.

Replace.Text: The Moroccan Goumiers (French: Les Goumiers Marocains) were indigenous soldiers who served in auxiliary units attached to the French Army of Africa, between 1908 and 1956. While nominally in the service of the Sultan of Morocco, they served under French officers. Employed initially as tribal irregulars, then in regular contingents, the goumiers were employed extensively during the French occupation of Morocco from 1908 to the early 1930s. They then served in Italy and France during World War II between 1942 and 1945. During this period four Moroccan Tabors Groupments (GTM) were created, each comprising 3 Tabors (battalion) with 3 to 4 Goums (companies). Goumiers then served in Indochina from 1946 to 1954.

Fast naval unit designed for naval exploration to find new continents. Egyptian unique early hit-and-run unit. Replaces the Chariot Archer. It is faster than the generic chariot and hitting the enemy with strong ranged attacks.
Unique Hunnic early hit-and-run unit. Replaces the Chariot Archer. It is stronger but cheaper than the generic chariot.

The Conquistador is a multi-purpose unit that is strong both on land and at sea. Replacing the Knight, it is a great scout on land with strong combat strength and extra visibility. It has stronger combat and also has the ability to found new cities, but only on a foreign continent that does not contain the Spanish capital. The Conquistador can move faster when embarking in the water. Earns 50% of opponents' strength as [ICON_GOLD] Gold for kills.(Not inheritable)
Unique unit of the Moroccan civilization. Replaces the Cavalry. It is a strng hit-and-run unit which boasts a better self-defense ability.

The Berber Cavalry is a unit good at desfesive actions. It has bonus defending enemy ranged units' attacks, which are the worst enemy of hit-and-run units. Therefore, the Berber Cavalry will give the Moroccans an edge when defending their territory in deserts.

Row.Text: [COLOR_YELLOW]Elite Infantry[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_YELLOW]The 300 Spartans[ENDCOLOR]
Elite infantry unit. Extremely strong when defending. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Spartiates Training Project and only one can exist in the world.
It could be the best unit for defensive actions. Deployed in the suitable terrain, it can hold up the whole enemy's army from marching. However it has no bonuses attacking enemy units.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Elite Spartan Infantry[ENDCOLOR]

O ye men who dwell in the streets of broad Lacedaemon![NEWLINE]Honor the festival of the Carneia!! Otherwise,[NEWLINE]Either your glorious town shall be sacked by the children of Perseus,[NEWLINE]Or, in exchange, must all through the whole Laconian country[NEWLINE]Mourn for the loss of a king, descendant of great Heracles.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Elite Light Cavalry[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_YELLOW]Numidian Cavalry[ENDCOLOR]

Elite hit-and-run unit. Can perform both melee attacks and ranged attacks. Can gain additional [ICON_MOVES] Movement by switching to "Rapid March" mode. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Numidian Cavalry Training Project and only one can exist in the world.

It is an elite hit-and-run unit focusing on rapid offensive operations with its excellent mobility. Its ranged attack ability allows it to strike the enemy safely within one-hex distance. What's more, you can use its "Rapid March" mode to gain additional movement for the current turn to send it to the front-line in time or quickly withdraw from the danger. Be aware that when entering the "Rapid March" mode, it is not allowed to attack.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Elite Light Cavalry[ENDCOLOR]

Numidian cavalry was a type of light cavalry developed by the Numidians. After they were used by Hannibal during the Second Punic War, they were described by the Roman historian Livy as "by far the best horsemen in Africa.

Replace.Text: Elite Archery Unit with longer shooting range, sundering ability and combat bonus against Heavy Mounted Units. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Longbowman Training Project and only one can exist in the world.

The longbowman starts with a shooting range of 3 hexes and can be multiplied to 4. What's more, it can also "sunder" the enemy's units to reduce their defending combat strength like Hit-and-run Units. As it is in the real history, the longbowman also has bonus against Heavy Mounted Units. All make it a wonderful ranged unit for defensive missions.
Elite mercenary unit. Can only be purchased in the city and can move after purchase. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Landsknecht Mercenary Project. You may purchase Landsknechts as many as you want.

Apart from being cheap and quick to purachse, this unit can pillage improvements at no movement cost and to pillage twice as much Gold from cities. This unit is great if you need a unit immediately, especially for defense. Maybe its strength is weaker than elite units, but its number is not. Also, since they are paid soliders, not your people, they won't cause the population loss even if many of they are destroyed.

Row.Text: [COLOR_YELLOW]Elite Rider[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_YELLOW]Xuan Jia Jun[ENDCOLOR]
Elite cavalry unit. After killing an enemy unit, it gains additional MP and attack chance for this turn. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Elite Rider Training Project and only one can exist in the world.

As the elite cavalry unit, it has the best balance of mobility, atttacking power and defense. It can gain additional MP and attacking chance after killing an enemy unit, making it a sharp sword cutting through the enemy battle line. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]However, it is still weak against anti-mounted unit and you can only have one Dark Armored Rider in your army. Use it wisely!
[COLOR_YELLOW]Elite Rider[ENDCOLOR]

The Xuan Jia Jun (Dark Armored Rider) were a Chinese elite heavy cavalry troops. They served as the Emperor Taizong of Tang's guards. This troop is made up of elite knights wearing dark steel armor. With their distinction in the war, they were always considered as on of the most powerful cavalry troops of the 7th centry.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Hwacha[ENDCOLOR]

Replace.Text: An extremely powerful prototype Multiple Rocket Launcher. Has a unique promotion line. It can cause area of effect (AoE) damage to multiple enemy units. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Early Multiple Rocket Launcher Project and only one can exist in the world.

The Hwacha is able to cause area of effect damage to multiple enemy units in one shot. Also it is the earliest ranged unit built with 4-hex range and indirect fire. It is a great weapon for defending a large group of enemy units but very ineffectively attacking cities. Also, never forget to use other units to protect it due to its slow movement and strength.

Row.Text: [COLOR_YELLOW]Zheng He's Fleet[ENDCOLOR]

This treasure fleet can conduct a trade mission in a City-State. Also, its combat strength can match any naval units in this era. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Treasure Voyages Project. You can only build up to 3 of this unit at one time. This unit CANNOT upgrade.

It can conduct a trade mission in a City-State like Great Merchants, but can make even more gold incme than Great Merchants. What's more, it is a powerful combat unit which can perform both melee and ranged attacks. Be aware it will be consumed in a trade mission and use it wisely.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Zheng He's Fleet[ENDCOLOR]

Zheng He (1371–1433), formerly romanized as Cheng Ho, was a Hui court eunuch, mariner, explorer, diplomat, and fleet admiral during China's early Ming Dynasty. Zheng commanded expeditionary voyages to Southeast Asia, South Asia, the Middle East, and East Africa from 1405 to 1433.

Replace.Text: Elite Infantry Unit which has great bonus fighting in snow, tundra, or hills. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Ski Infantry Training Project. You can only build up to 10 of this unit at one time. Cannot be purchased.

The Ski Infantry, as their name suggests, are true masters when fighting in snow, tundra, or hills. They not only receive a combat bonus there, but also move at double speed. Even tanks cannot match these elite units on such terrains.

Row.Text: [COLOR_YELLOW]Prototype Submarine[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_YELLOW]The Nautilus[ENDCOLOR]
You are right, it is a real submarine and can move underwater. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Prototype Submarine Project and only one can exist in the world.

This is the first thing which can move underwater in the game. Since nobody can see it in this era, it can freely enter other nation's territory without an open border deal. Although it is still an experimental unit armed with inferior weapons, it can still cause chaos in the enemy's fleet without being detected. (You are right that The Nautilus doesn't attack with torpedoes but now it is not in the novel but in the game. We need BALANCE! )
[COLOR_YELLOW]Prototype Submarine[ENDCOLOR]

" Here, M. Aronnax, are the several dimensions of the boat you are in. It is an elongated cylinder with conical ends. It is very like a cigar in shape, a shape already adopted in London in several constructions of the same sort. The length of this cylinder, from stem to stern, is exactly 70 m, and its maximum breadth is eight metres. It is not built on a ratio of ten to one like your long-voyage steamers, but its lines are sufficiently long, and its curves prolonged enough, to allow the water to slide off easily, and oppose no obstacle to its passage. These two dimensions enable you to obtain by a simple calculation the surface and cubic contents of the Nautilus. Its area measures 1011.45 square metres; and its contents 1,500.2 cubic metres; that is to say, when completely immersed it displaces 1500.2 cubic metres of water, or 1500.2 metric tons. " - Captain Nemo
[COLOR_YELLOW]Super Howitzer[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_YELLOW]Big Bertha[ENDCOLOR]
An extremely powerful super-heavy mortar which can destroy buildings in the target city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Super Howitzer Project and only one can exist in the world.

This super-heavy mortar can frie from a very long range. Its accrucy and power allows it to destroy one enemy's city's milltary building every shot like stragic bombers. Although it is powerful, you still need to protect it from enemy's assault.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Super Howitzer[ENDCOLOR]

The howitzer was mainly designed by Krupp's Director of design, Professor Fritz Rausenberger, and his predecessor, Director Dräger. Many sources say that Bertha is a reference to Bertha Krupp, heiress and owner of the Krupp industrial empire. Not all accept this connection.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Zeppelin (Airship Carrier)[ENDCOLOR]
A large airship wich can carry 6 Land-based Aircrafts. Can cross mountain and water. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Airship Carrier Project and only one can exist in the world.

This large airship carrier can carry 6 Land-based Aircrafts (including stealth bombers). It can serve as a floating airbase to make sure the enemy targets are within the flight range of your aircrafts, especially for those early aircrafts with a poor flight range. It cannot attack the enemy units on its own but it can sustain a lot of damage by its size and armor. it is highly recommended to build this airship carrier as fast as you can since the late-game aircrafts like jet fighters have long flight range so they no longer need this old fashioned floating airbase. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It CANNOT load or resupply Carrier-based Aircrafts.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Zeppelin[ENDCOLOR]

A Zeppelin is a type of rigid airship named after the German Count Ferdinand von Zeppelin who pioneered rigid airship development at the beginning of the 20th century. Zeppelin's ideas were first formulated in 1874 and developed in detail in 1893.They were patented in Germany in 1895 and in the United States in 1899. After the outstanding success of the Zeppelin design, the word zeppelin came to be commonly used to refer to all rigid airships.

Replace.Text: An experimental steam-powered armored vehicle. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Land Ironclad Project. You can only build up to 10 of this unit at one time.

The Land Ironclad is a legendary steam-powered unit designed to break through enemy battle line. It is an Armored Unit so pikes cannot stop it for its heavy armor and machine gun so there is no way to stop this iron monster in its era. However, it will quickly become old-fashioned when landship is unlocked.
Elite mercenary militia unit. Can only be purchased in the city and can move after purchase. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Elite Militia Project. You can purchase as many as you want.

Cossack is a Militia Unit, but its combat strength, abilities and mobility can match regular army units. Like the Landsknecht, it is ver cheap and won't cause population loss when KIA. Use it number to overwhelm your enemies!

Row.Text: [COLOR_YELLOW]Elite Sniper[ENDCOLOR]

Elite Sniper Unit, move stealthily and can paradrop within 16 hexes. [NEWLINE]Every time you kill an enemy, +3 [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] range combat strength. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Elite Sniper Training Project and only one can exist in the world.

The Elite Sniper can cause chaos to the enemy by destroying their supply line. It has excellent mobility and have 100% chance of withdarw if engaged in melee combat, which makes it the best harassment unit.

Snipers of the Soviet Union played an important role mainly on the Eastern Front of World War II, apart from other preceding and subsequent conflicts. In World War II, Soviet snipers used the 7.62×54mmR rifle cartridge with light, heavy, armour-piercing (B-30), armour-piercing-incendiary (B-32), zeroing-and-incendiary (P3), and tracer bullets. Most Soviet World War II snipers carried a combat load of 120 rifle cartridges in the field. Unlike the militaries of other nations, these snipers could be men or women. In 1943, there were over 2,000 women functioning in this role.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Bismarck (Super Battleship)[ENDCOLOR]
An extremely durable heavy armored battleship. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Heavy Armored Battle Ship Project and only one can exist in the world.

Bismark is actrually a Battlecruiser in the game. It has the attributes of Heavy Cruisers and receive same promotions, but its combat strength is the same with Battleships. This heavy armored battleship is very durable and recovers its HP very fast. If you want to destroy it in one turn, you need at least 15 submarines or aircrafts. Thus, it can serve as an excellent "body shield" of your fleet to draw the enemy's firepower and protect your high value units.

Bismarck was the first of two Bismarck-class battleships built for Nazi Germany's Kriegsmarine. Named after Chancellor Otto von Bismarck, the primary force behind the unification of Germany in 1871, the ship was laid down at the Blohm Voss shipyard in Hamburg in July 1936 and launched in February 1939. Work was completed in August 1940, when she was commissioned into the German fleet. Bismarck and her sister ship Tirpitz were the largest battleships ever built by Germany, and two of the largest built by any European power.
[COLOR_YELLOW]SR-71 "Black Bird"[ENDCOLOR]
Provides +100% [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] Combat Bonus for aircrafts in the same tile. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Project Habu and only one can exist in the world.

SR-71 "Black Bird" is not a fighter but a reconnaissance aircraft. It cannot attack the enemy but can carry out aerial reconnaissance to offer intels for your air force and give you an edge in air combat or air strike. Click the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]"Perform Long-range Reconnaissance Mission"[ENDCOLOR] on the unit commands panel to offer a temporarily Combat Bonus (+25%) for all of your aircrafts in this turn. SR-71 "Black Bird" flies high in the sky where no fighters can reach, so it is indestructible unless its city is breached.
[COLOR_YELLOW]SR-71 "Black Bird"[ENDCOLOR]

The Lockheed SR-71 "Blackbird" is a long-range, Mach 3+ strategic reconnaissance aircraft that was operated by the United States Air Force. It was developed as a black project from the Lockheed A-12 reconnaissance aircraft in the 1960s by Lockheed and its Skunk Works division.

The Enterprise can only been generated if you finish the Grey Ghost Project and then you declared or were declared war. [NEWLINE]Everyturn after your War State Change as above, every aircraft carrier of yours have a chance to transfer to the Enterprise and keep all the promotions until one transfered successfully or your capital was occupied. [NEWLINE]Only one may ever been generated in the world.

Not only a powerful 4-cargo carrier with extra promotions which supremes the Nuclear Carrier of next generation, but also a legendary carrier which buffs probably the aircrafts. She can also transfer as her sister carrier the Hornet(CV-8) to be available for Land-Based-Aircrafts.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Enterprise(CV-6)[ENDCOLOR]

USS Enterprise (CV-6) was the seventh U.S. Navy vessel to bear the name. Colloquially called "the Big E". A Yorktown-class carrier, she was launched in 1936 and was one of only three American carriers commissioned before World War II to survive the war. She participated in more major actions of the war against Japan than any other United States ship. These actions included the Attack on Pearl Harbor, the Battle of Midway, the Battle of the Eastern Solomons, the Battle of the Santa Cruz Islands, various other air-sea engagements during the Guadalcanal Campaign, the Battle of the Philippine Sea, and the Battle of Leyte Gulf. Enterprise earned 20 battle stars, the most for any U.S. warship in World War II, and was the most decorated U.S. ship of World War II. On three occasions during the Pacific War, the Japanese announced that she had been sunk in battle, inspiring her nickname "The Grey Ghost". [NEWLINE]Tokyo Raid [NEWLINE]Escorting the Hornet(CV-8), she also participated the Tokyo Raid, the first air operation to strike the Japanese Home Islands. It demonstrated that the Japanese mainland was vulnerable to American air attack, served as retaliation for the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor, and provided an important boost to American morale. [NEWLINE]Battle of Midway [NEWLINE]At the Battle of Midway, only 3 dive bombers of Enterprise attacked the Japanese carrier Akagi and only 1 bomb hited the target, which, surprisely, disabled her and make her sunk at last.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Enterprise(CV-6)[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_YELLOW]Hornet(CV-8)[ENDCOLOR]

USS Hornet (CV-8), the seventh ship to carry the name Hornet, was a Yorktown-class aircraft carrier of the United States Navy. During World War II in the Pacific Theater, she launched the Doolittle Raid on Tokyo and participated in the Battle of Midway and the Buin-Faisi-Tonolai Raid. In the Solomon Islands campaign she was involved in the capture and defense of Guadalcanal and the Battle of the Santa Cruz Islands where she was irreparably damaged by enemy torpedo and dive bombers. Faced with an approaching Japanese surface force, Hornet was abandoned and later torpedoed and sunk by approaching Japanese destroyers. Hornet was in service for a year and six days and was the last US fleet carrier ever sunk by enemy fire. For these actions, she was awarded four service stars, a citation for the Doolittle Raid in 1995, and her Torpedo Squadron 8 received a Presidential Unit Citation for extraordinary heroism for the Battle of Midway. [NEWLINE]Hornet can cargo 6 land-based-aircrafts. Every friendly Aircraft in the same tile of her have a chance to freely upgrade at the start of every turn if the technology allows.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Panzer VIII Maus (Super-heavy Tank)[ENDCOLOR]
A heavy armored tank armed with devastating 128 mm gun. It is almost invincible on the ground. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Super-heavy Tank Project and only one can exist in the world.

Its large size and mass make it withstand a lot of damage and its main gun makes it can perform one-hex ranged attack. However its size and mass make it lack of mobility and can be overwhlemed by enemy's attack aircrafts from the sky.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Panzer VIII Maus[ENDCOLOR]

Panzerkampfwagen VIII Maus ("mouse") was a German World War II super-heavy tank completed in late 1944. It is the heaviest fully enclosed armoured fighting vehicle ever built. Only two hulls and one turret were completed before the testing grounds were captured by the advancing Soviet forces.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Yamato (Super Battleship)[ENDCOLOR]

A super battleship which is is almost invincible in the sea. It can be set to "Full Attack" mode to double the firepower and +1 range at a sacrifice of mobility. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Super Battleship Project and only one can exist in the world.

Its amazing combat strength can cause or sustain massive damage. If you want more firepower, you may set it to "Full Attack" mode and its double-powered gunfire will destroy anything within its range. However when it is in this mode it will lose 3 mobility and become very slow - actually it is already too slow. As a result, you'd better escort it with some anti-air units unless you want the hisory repeat itself.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Yamato[ENDCOLOR]

Yamato, named after the ancient Japanese Yamato Province, was the lead ship of the Yamato class of battleships that served with the Imperial Japanese Navy during World War II. She and her sister ship, Musashi, were the heaviest and most powerfully armed battleships ever constructed, displacing 72,800 tonnes at full load and armed with nine 46 cm (18.1 inch) main guns.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Prototype Stealth Bomber[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_YELLOW]Horten Ho 229[ENDCOLOR]

An experimental prototype stealth bomber. Apart from its long air-range, it has a chance of 50% to evade enemy fighter's interception. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It cannot be deployed on Carriers.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Prototype Stealth Bomber Project and only one can exist in the world.

It is a transcendal weapon which can avoid enemy's fighter's interception. Also its flight range can match the next-generation bomber. However the chance is 50%, not 100%. If you don't trust your luck, do some air-sweep before its mission. This aircraft is very expensive.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Prototype Stealth Bomber[ENDCOLOR]

The Horten H.IX, RLM designation Ho 229 (often called Gotha Go 229 because of the identity of the chosen manufacturer of the aircraft) was a German prototype fighter/bomber designed by Reimar and Walter Horten and built by Gothaer Waggonfabrik late in World War II. It was the first pure flying wing powered by jet engines.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Tsar Bomba(King of Bombs)[ENDCOLOR]
An ultimate nuclear bomb which can destroy non-capital cities in one hit. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires the Manhattan Project and Trutnev-Babaev Project. Only one can exist in the world.

Tsar Bomba has the same destructive power of the ICBM, which can destroy non-capital cities or reduce the population of capital cities to 1 in one hit. It is a strategic weapon of great deterrence power. Fortunately it can be banned by the nuclear non-proliferation resolution.

Tsar Bomba (Russian: Царь-бомба; "Tsar-bomb") was a hydrogen bomb. It was the most powerful nuclear weapon ever detonated. Its test on October 30, 1961, remains the most powerful man-made explosion in human history. It was also referred to as Kuz'kina Mat' (Russian: Кузькина мать, Kuzma's mother), referring to Nikita Khrushchev's promise to show the United States a "Kuz'kina Mat'" at the 1960 United Nations General Assembly.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Kondensator(Nuclear Artillery)[ENDCOLOR]
A tactical nuclear artillery can cause massive damage to enemy's units in groups or kill citizens in a city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Nuclear Artillery Project. Only one can exist in the world.

Kondensator is a tactical nuclear weapon, although it shares the same attributes with the railroad gun and rocket artillery, which can cause area-of-effect damage within 1 hex, it can also damage all stacked units within its blast radius. Like strategic bombers and nuclear weapons, it will cause catastrophic civilian casualties if attacking a city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This is a tactical nuclear weapon so it won't cause fallout and cannot be banned by the nuclear non-proliferation resolution.
The 2A3 originated during the Cold War as a response to the United States' new "Pentomic Division" tactical doctrine that emphasized heavy use of nuclear weapons including nuclear artillery.

Replace.Text: A tactical nuclear device launching a rocket with nuclear warhead, which can destroy any single unit in one-hit. The shooter himself will also be killed in the explosion. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Tactical Nuclear Recoilless Gun Project. Only one can exist in the world.

A Nuclear Rocket Launcher is a portable nuclear device and a suicide weapon. It is so small that can move stealthily. Its nuclear warhead is not powerful enough to cause area-of-effect damage but it is enough to destroy any single unit, including the Giant Death Robot in one shot. Unfortunately, the design of this weapon is so stupid that the lethal radius is larger than its range of fire. Thus, the shooter will be killed in its blast. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This is a tactical nuclear weapon so it won't cause fallout and cannot be banned by the nuclear non-proliferation resolution.

Row.Text: [COLOR_YELLOW]Hydra (Underwater Carrier)[ENDCOLOR]

An experimental underwater carrier. It can carry 9 Land-based Aircrafts, including stealth bombers and move underwater like a submarine. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Prototype Underwater Carrier Project and only one can exist in the world.

This gaint underwater carrier can move deep into enemy's territory without being noticed by hiding underwater. You can image enemy will be shocked by suffering from ferocious air attacks from no where. It is also armed with torpedo launchers to defend itself from enemy submarine attacks. Although it can work independently from your naval fleet but try not to make too much attraction. Maybe you don't think it is vaulable but think about all aircrafts inside. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It CANNOT load or resupply Carrier-based Aircrafts.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Hydra[ENDCOLOR]
Information Classified
[COLOR_YELLOW]XM2001 Crusader (Prototype SPG)[ENDCOLOR]

An experimental mobile artillery much moves faster than normal mobile artillery units. Like Yamato, it can be set to "Full Attack" mode to double the firepower and +1 range at a sacrifice of mobility. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Next-generation Self-propelled Howitzer Project and only one can exist in the world.

This artillery unit is highly mobile, which allows it to offer quick fire support for your frontline troops. If can also be set to "Full Attack" mode to greatly increase its friepower and range for long-term tasks.
[COLOR_YELLOW]XM2001 Crusader[ENDCOLOR]

The Crusader was intended to replace the M109A6 Paladin Self-Propelled Howitzer and the M992 Field Artillery Ammunition Support Vehicle (FAASV). It was intended to be an automated gun artillery system to support the Interim Brigade Combat Teams (IBCT) Counterattack Corps and a basis for other vehicle developments.
[COLOR_YELLOW]RAH-66 Comanche[ENDCOLOR]

A Stealth Helicopter which can move invisible to most of the enemy units and spot enemy stealthy units. It has the skill of "Target Marking", which will make nearby enemy units vulnerable to your artillery fire and airstrikes. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Light Helicopter Experimental Program and only one can exist in the world.

This stealth helicopter can move stealthily and attack enemy units within 2-hex range. However this is not the best way to use it. The wise commander will use its ability to mark the enemy units, then call artillery bombardment or airstrike to destroy them easily. However you should be aware that it will cost extra movement to mark targets. You need to plan its flight route to avoid running out of MP in the enemy territory. Alouth it is stealthy, it is still weak against enemy anti-air weapons if being spotted. (Yeah I know this model is not RAH-66 Comanche but I just cannot find the right model)
[COLOR_YELLOW]RAH-66 Comanche[ENDCOLOR]

The Boeing-Sikorsky RAH-66 Comanche was an advanced five-blade armed reconnaissance and attack helicopter designed for the United States Army. The RAH-66 program was canceled in 2004, before mass production began, after nearly US$7 billion was spent on the program.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Task Force 141[ENDCOLOR]

The Elite Special Forces Unit whic start with all Special Forces Unit's Promotions. Can use air EVAC to return to your Capital at any time from anywhere. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Task Force 141 Project and only one can exist in the world.

This unit is made up of a well-trained soldiers. It not only has all Special Forces Unit's Promotions after training but also can paradrop 20 tiles aways, as well as attack mutiple times in its turn. Task Force 141 is made up by the best soldiers in the world for carrying out the most dangerous missions. Yeah, Captain Price and Captain MacTavish both love these missions. Don't worry if they are in trouble. Just call Nikolai to get them out and send back to your Capital.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Task Force 141[ENDCOLOR]

"The healthy human mind doesn't wake up in the morning thinking this is its last day on earth. But I think that's a luxury, not a curse. To know you're close to the end is a kind of freedom. Good time to take... inventory. Outgunned. Outnumbered. Out of our minds. On a suicide mission. But the sand and rocks here stained with thousands of years of warfare... they will remember us. For this. Because out of all our vast array of nightmares this is the one we choose for ourselves. We go forward like a breath exhaled from the earth. With vigor in our hearts and one goal in sight: We. Will. Kill him." - Captain Price

Replace.Text: It is so tall that it can cross the mountains or walking in costal area. It is immune to strategic nuclear weapons' blasts and free from some debuff effects from the enemy like "sundered" and "slowed down". Can heal every turn.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Prototype Mecha Project and only one can exist in the world.

Giant, but fast, this is the battle machine of the future, has More Hit Point. Since it is remotely controlled by its pilot, it has no fears and never feels pain. Thus, these debuff effects - "Sundered", "Slowed Down", "Charged Damage", "Target Marked", prove to be useless on it. All of these make it the strongest defender unit in the game. It can also survive any strategic nuclear weapons' blasts including the ICBM. However, its CPU will be affected by enemy EMP attack and suffer from Collateral Damage and Area of Effect Damage, which cannot be avoided by remote-control.

Row.Text: [COLOR_YELLOW]PAK FA T-50[ENDCOLOR]
The most advanced multirole fighter unit. Can attack land and naval units. Also equipped with EMP Missiles[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires PAK FA Project and only one can exist in the world.

This multirole fighter can not only give you an excellent performance in dogfight and interception missions but atack land or naval units. What's more, it is equipped with EMP Missiles, which means each shoot to the units or cities will paralyze all units within 1 hex range or cause a Blackout to the target city for one turn (this effect can multiply). Thus, this Fighter can function as a strategic weapon.
[COLOR_YELLOW]PAK FA T-50[ENDCOLOR]

The T-50 is intended to be the successor to the MiG-29 and Su-27 in the Russian Air Force and serve as the basis of the Sukhoi/HAL FGFA being developed with India.[12][13] The aircraft combines supersonic cruise, stealth, maneuverability, and advanced avionics and software to overcome legacy fighter aircraft as well as ground and maritime defences. The T-50 prototype first flew on 29 January 2010 and the aircraft is slated to enter service in the Russian Air Force in 2016.[14] The prototypes and initial production batch will be delivered with heavily upgraded models of Su-27 powerplants as interim engines while a new clean-sheet design engine is currently under development.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Weishi Rockets (WS-64)[ENDCOLOR]
Weishi Rockets (WS-64)
Elite Long Range Multiple Rocket Launcher. It has great mobility and huge combat bonus against naval units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Anti-ship MLRS Project and only one can exist in the world.

Weishi Rockets is the ultimate MRLS. The combat strength, attacking range, mobility and attacks per turn of Weishi Rockets are all twice of the ordinary MRLS. Its long attacking range and huge combat bonus make it the best land-based anti-navy unit for coastline defense.

The Weishi (WS; Chinese: 卫士; literally: "Guardian") family of the multiple rocket launcher systems were mainly developed by Sichuan Aerospace Industry Corporation (SCAIC, also known as Base 062) in Chengdu, Sichuan Province. The Weishi series rocket systems include the 302mm WS-1 (100 km range), the improved 302mm WS-1B (180 km range), the 122mm WS-1E (40 km), the 400mm WS-2 (200 km range), as well as many other models. The WS-1 series weapon system did not enter PLA service and has order from Thailand. The WS-2 may finally see PLA service in the future. It's worth noticing that although sharing the same name, there are other developers for different models of Weishi series multiple rocket launchers (MRL) other than the primary developer SCAIC.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Super Hacker[ENDCOLOR]

Can hack into your enemy's national network and cause the whole country fall into anarchy for two turns. Must inside the target nation's territory to perform its action. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Bit Weapon Project and only one can exist in the world.

Super Hacker is a strategic weapon which can cause a whole nation to stop functioning for 2 turns. It can reverse the whole situation when your opponent will launch Spaceship or everyone will wear its jeans in the next turn. For game balance, the hacker can only hack into the civilization currently at war with you and the Hacker must be inside your target's nation's territory for hacking. The hacker is only a computer geek who cannot fight with a gun. You must protect it with military units.

In the computer security context, a hacker is someone who seeks and exploits weaknesses in a computer system or computer network. Hackers may be motivated by a multitude of reasons, such as profit, protest, challenge, enjoyment, or to evaluate those weaknesses to assist in removing them. The subculture that has evolved around hackers is often referred to as the computer underground.
[COLOR_YELLOW]Proton Collider Vessel[ENDCOLOR]

Its proton collider gun will cause "butterfly effects", one shot will do damage to every visible enemy unit on the map. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Particle Weapon Development Project and only one can exist in the world.

Just like the Proton Collider in Red Alert 3 for golbal bombardment. This superweapon can spread its damage to every visible enemy unit (33% of the damage caused to the target) across the whole map. There will be no safe place for your enemy to hide. However its combat strength is limited, it is almost impossible to kill all enemy units in one shot.
Classified
[COLOR_GREEN]Kinetic Bombardment System[ENDCOLOR]

A superweapon for golbal bombardment. Once the tungsten rods launched, every enemy city's HP will immediately drop to 0. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If the controller unit is destroyed, this weapon system is disabled.

The Kinetic Bombardment System can make all of your enemy's cities capturable by one click at the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]"Start Global Kinetic Orbital Strike"[ENDCOLOR] button on unit commands panel. If you have enough melee units in position, you are ablE to wipe out a superpower country of more than 20 cities in one turn.
[COLOR_GREEN]Kinetic Bombardment System[ENDCOLOR]

A kinetic bombardment or a kinetic orbital strike is the hypothetical act of attacking a planetary surface with an inert projectile, where the destructive force comes from the kinetic energy of the projectile impacting at very high velocities. The concept is often encountered in science fiction and originated during the Cold War.The typical depiction of the tactic is of a satellite containing a magazine of tungsten rods and a directional thrust system. When a strike is ordered, the satellite would brake one of the rods out of its orbit and into a geostationary position while directly over the target. The rod would then begin to fall towards the earth, picking up immense speed until it reached terminal velocity shortly before impact. The rods would often be shaped so as to increase the terminal velocity. In science fiction, the tactic is often depicted as being launched from a spaceship, instead of a satellite.

[NEWLINE]To carrier-based: [NEWLINE]This order will remove all the Land-Based-Aircrafts in the Hornet and make her available for Carrier-Based-Aircrafts(the Enterprise), it costs no movement but you can not bless a good luck until your next turn. Row.Text: [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]Huey Teocalli[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET] Get two missionaries and all cities get free temples. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] New land army units in this city have +15 experience. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] Allow Faith to buy Cougar and Eagle Warriors. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] can move the army military unit to this city for human sacrifice, and get [ICON_CULTURE] culture and [ICON_PEACE] belief equivalent to 300% of the combat power of the military unit. The unit has a 20% chance of surviving, and it will be promoted to [The Power of the God of War Zilopochtli], +50 maximum HP, and +10% combat power.

The temples in the Aztec Empire were terraced pyramids topped by a temple, which was the site of all the important religious ceremonies in the region. The Temple of Huey (or, as it is called in Spanish, the Great Temple), the grandest temple, stands in the center of Tenochtitlan and is dedicated to two gods: Vezilo, the god of war Pochitelli and Tadoc, the god of agriculture (this also shows what was important in Aztec culture). Each deity has a separate temple, reached by a separate staircase. Mesoamerican pyramids were often rebuilt, using the original structures as bases for new towers that were continually enlarged. Thus, after its completion in 1325, the Temple of Huey was rebuilt six times. During its seventh and final construction, it was sacked and destroyed by Cortes and his conquerors. Only a few ruins remain, but people still indulge in eccentric celebrations of it...such as the fifteenth month celebration of the god of war, Vitzilopochtli, where amaranth is enshrined Deities made of plant seeds, bones, honey and human blood, which were then left for the common people to eat.

Gangtok is a city , the capital and the largest populated place of Sikkim. The Kingdom of Sikkim was founded by the Namgyal dynasty in the 17th century.It became a princely state of British India in 1890. Following Indian independence, Sikkim continued its "protectorate status" with the Union of India after 1947, and the Republic of India after 1950.In 1973, anti-royalist riots took place in front of the Chogyal's palace. In 1975, after the Indian Army took over the city of Gangtok, a referendum under surveillance with Indian army was held that led to the dissolution of the monarchy and Sikkim joining India as its 22nd state.

Dubai is the most populous city in the United Arab Emirates (UAE) and the capital of the Emirate of Dubai, the most populated of the 7 emirates of the United Arab Emirates.This city grew rapidly in the early 21st century with a focus on tourism and luxury, having the second most five-star hotels in the world, and the tallest building in the world, the Burj Khalifa, which is 828 metres (2,717 ft) tall. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]In the eastern Arabian Peninsula on the coast of the Persian Gulf, it is also a major global transport hub for passengers and cargo. Oil revenue helped accelerate the development of the city, which was already a major mercantile hub.
